[\[1b.1\]{D2341}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sa hA dza gI ti/_bod skad du/_lhan cig skyes pa'i glu/_bla ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/stong pa'i nags las me tog rab rgyas pa/_/me
[\[1b.2\]]tog gcig la kha dog sna tshogs te/_/dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal/_/rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang /_/de la rtsa ba med cing yal 'dab med/_/grogs dag ser
[\[1b.3\]]kha bzang po'i phyogs rgyal ltos/_/dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal/_/rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang /_/ge sar blangs pas sgyu 'phrul mkhan po yin/_/rdo rje dbang
[\[1b.4\]]phyug chos kyi dbyings la mchod/_/dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal/_/rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang /_/mchog dang dga' bral rnam par brtags te zung /_/bla ma
[\[1b.5\]]dam pa'i zhabs la gus pas mchod/_/dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal/_/rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang /_/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shAn+ta de bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//_
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]bla ma d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA na'i zhabs dang /_lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur/[ {D2342}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tat+nyA swa b+hA ba dr-i Sh+Ti gI ti ka do ha nA ma/_bod skad du/_rang bzhin gyi do ha mdzod kyi
[\[2a.2\]]glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnyis med bdud rtsi kun 'dus grub thob kyi/_/dri med dgongs pa lta spyod la sogs ni/_/nyams len thabs de kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/bde gshegs
[\[2a.3\]]rnams la phyag 'tshal bshad par bya/_/dngos po yang ni ma yin zhing /_/dngos med la ni ma skyes pa'i/_/'di lta bu yi rang bzhin ni/_/su zhig gis ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/lU yi pa ni smra bar byed/_/'di lta bu
[\[2a.4\]]ni ngo mtshar che/_/khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang /_/de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med/_/de yi kha dog rigs dang ni/_/dbyibs kyang bdag gis rtogs pa med/_/de lta bu yi rang bzhin ni/_/dngos por ma
[\[2a.5\]]grub ji ltar bstan/_/lU yi ba ni smra bar byed/_/'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che/_/khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang /_/de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med/_/bdag gis gzhan la ji ltar dri/_/chu gting zla ba'i gzugs
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]brnyan ni/_/don dam sgyu mar rtogs pa med/_/lU yi pa ni smra bar byed/_/'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che/_/khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang /_/de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med/_/lU yi pa ni smra bar byed/_/bdag gis gzhan la ji ltar dri/_/de yi rang bzhin rtogs pa
[\[2b.2\]]med/_/rang bzhin gyi do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba slob dpon lU yi bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/[ {D2343}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bi ka wa pa ri ha ra sti ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_rnam rtog spang ba'i glu zhes bya ba/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/po la gsang
[\[2b.3\]]ba'i rdo rje la/_/'dus pa sems kyi rang bzhin ni/_/thig le gsang ba'i rtsa la breng /_/kak+ko la yi kha sbyor la/_/kye ho re ni 'bar bar byed/_/kr-i bi ta yi sgra sgrogs pas/_/rtsa drug 'khor lo hUM gis bcing /_/sku gsum d+hU tIr bdag med rtogs/_/rang byung me tog ldan pa yi/_/_
[\[2b.4\]]ga pur bo la bsres byas nas/_/ka ru ka'i bdud rtsi 'thung bar gyis/_/ka li dze ra skal bar ldan/_/rnal 'byor tshogs su bsre bar bya/_/'du d+hu ra skal bar mi ldan te/_/spongs shig rnal 'byor dam tshig go/_/bzhi mnyam gla rtsi lus byugs nas/_/rtog pa rnams ni spang bar
[\[2b.5\]]bya/_/dpa' bo dpa' mo'i tshogs dag tu/_/he ru ka yi nga rgyal ldan/_/sha wa zhing chen khur byas nas/_/ma la rigs skyes bram zel/_/kun du phrad pa'i rnal 'byor ba/_/rtog pa mi bya lus la gnas/_/kye ho skal ldan mchod par gyis/_/li la bdag med seng ge yis/_/_
[\[2b.6\]]stong nyid don ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/rnam rtog spang phyir rnal 'byor kye/_/bdag ni gan rgyal nyal byas nas/_/lag pa bsnol nas bral la sbyar/_/rang rig nam mkha'i phyogs su gtad/_/li la skyes te gnyis med rtogs/_/rtog med rnal 'byor grub pa thob/_/li la pa yis
[\[2b.7\]]rtogs nas gol/_/rnam rtog spang ba'i glu zhes bya ba slob dpon li la pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D2344}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_karma tsaN+Da lI ka do ha gI ti nA ma/_bod skad du/_las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/_don thams cad grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]nang nas gtum mo'i me sbar bas/_/dbus nas bdud rtsi 'bab par byed/_/rang byung sdong bu skyes pa yis/_/rtse mo'i ri la phyin te gnas/_/mgon po'i bdud rtsi 'bab par byed/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom/_/gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs
[\[3a.2\]]pa spangs/_/sangs rgyas yon tan phreng ba 'byung /_/bde ba chen po rgyas pa yis/_/thams cad kyis ni khyab par 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom/_/gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs/_/rdo rjes brkos shing bgos pa la/_/nyi zla gnyis ni bsres
[\[3a.3\]]byas nas/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su thim par 'gyur/_/bde ba chen po'i grong du phyin/_/kun dbus sangs rgyas yon tan gyis/_/rin chen 'byung ba'i gnas su brtol/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom/_/gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs/_/'byung rgyu'i rlung ni
[\[3a.4\]]bkag pa yis/_/rin chen gsal ba'i gnas su phyin/_/brtags shing brtags shing dpyad pa yis/_/bi rU bdag gis 'grub par 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom/_/gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs/_/las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes
[\[3a.5\]]bya ba slob dpon bi rU pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D2345}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_b+ha ba na dr-iSh+Ti tsAR+Ya pha la do ha gI ti ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu'i do ha'i glu zhes bya ba/_'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dngos po sna tshogs rang gi sems nyid yin/_/_
[\[3a.6\]]'khor 'das thams cad rnal 'byor dbyer med pa/_/sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med pa ste/_/dper na chu dang de yi rlabs bzhin no/_/dngos dang dngos min spangs pa'i sems nyid 'di/_/rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor skad cig gcig la ni/_/sgron me chung ngu zhig gis mun pa
[\[3a.7\]]ltar/_/'khor ba'i dug lnga rang bzhin rab rib sel/_/zung 'jug phyag rgya blo 'das chen po ni/_/bde gsal mi rtog nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/khyab cing rgya chen snying rje chen po'i ngo /_/snang yang rang bzhin med pa chu zla bzhin/_/gsal yang tha snyad mtha' dbus kun dang bral/_/gang
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]gis ma gos dri med re dogs bral/_/lkugs pa'i rmi lam bzhin du smra mi shes/_/tshad med bde chen rang bzhin ye shes ni/_/nyi zla'i 'od bzhin phyogs dang bral ba med/_/kye ho rnal 'byor rang 'byung ngo mtshar che/_/gnyug ma ma bcos sems ni chos sku ste/_/bcos pa'i sems
[\[3b.2\]]kyis rnal 'byor thob mi 'gyur/_/de phyir bde ba'i phyogs su yan par mthong /_/rang bzhin grub pa'i lam thob rnal 'byor bde/_/rnam rtog bral bas zhe 'dod 'byung mi srid/_/rta mgrin grub thob bdag nyid sar has smras/_/kye ho rnal 'byor lta ba'i nyams len gyis/_/de yi rang
[\[3b.3\]]bzhin gang zhig sgom 'dod na/_/rang lus ri bo 'di ni gnas kyi mchog/_/sems nyid dus kyi rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/_/dbang po rnams bcings mtshams bcad pa de bar 'gyur/_/g.yeng ba rnams kyang ched du spang mi bya/_/tug phrad sems su shes na yi dam lha/_/shes pa ma
[\[3b.4\]]bkug rtog pa rim gyis spangs/_/sems la rnam rtog byung na rnal 'byor bas/_/ras bal 'dab ma bzhin du glod la zhog_/bya ba spongs la rang sems rang gis ltos/_/zhe 'dod byung na bdud du shes par gyis/_/rnam rtog rnams kyi rtsa ba sems yin te/_/de med phyir na
[\[3b.5\]]rnam rtog yod min no/_/dran pa dran med bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor te/_/sems 'di rtag par ma grub rang la thim/_/bsgom 'dod med pas sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob/_/rnal 'byor bu chung lta bur rtog pa med/_/ldum ra'i bud pas me tog ro myang ltar/_/nags nas nags su
[\[3b.6\]]'khyam pa seng ge bzhin/_/kun du rgyu ba sna tshogs rlung ltar ni/_/sems nyid bag dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog_/rang bzhin mi dgag smyon pa lta bur spyod/_/rgyab tu mi chags mdun du zhen pa med/_/mdor na lta sgom spyod pa nyams len la/_/ji ltar phan pa'i spyod pas
[\[3b.7\]]rnal 'byor spyod/_/sna tshogs snang ba sems kyi ngo bo 'di/_/tug phrad tsam gyis ma grub phyag rgya che/_/snang la mi snang 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'byung /_/de la sems na dngos grub dam pa yin/_/phyi nang thams cad lhan cig skyes pa 'di/_/rnam rtog chu bo'i rgyun gyi rnal 'byor
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]'dra/_/de yang sems las gzhan na btsal du med/_/yid la mi gzhag phyag rgya chen po'i lam/_/'bras bu ma re rtogs na phyag rgya che/_/ma rtogs rtog pa nam mkha'i sprin dang 'dra/_/rtogs na de nyid rang bzhin stong pa yin/_/lta spyod 'bras bu dbyer med lhan
[\[4a.2\]]cig skyes/_/rang bzhin dbyer med rtogs na 'bras bu'i mchog_/lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu do ha'i glu zhes bya ba slob dpon sa ra ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D2346}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tat+tAM do ha gI ti ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu zhes bya ba/_
[\[4a.3\]]'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/brtags na bdag gzhan dngos po med/_/byis pa lkugs pa'i rmi lam 'dra/_/de nyid rtogs pa shin tu dka'/_/byis pa rgyan po rtse ba 'dra/_/tha ka na ni smra bar byed/_/de nyid tshig gis brjod pa dka'/_/snang stong rtog pa ma sel bar/_/thar
[\[4a.4\]]pa thob par ga la 'gyur/_/lus ngag yid gsum dbyings su ni/_/de nyid mnyam par ma shes na/_/de nyid rtogs par shin tu dka'/_/byis pa rgyan po rtse ba 'dra/_/dngos po tshig gis brjod pa dka'/_/chos rnams tshig tu smra ba yang /_/tshig tsam gyis ni 'grub bam ca/_/sems kyi
[\[4a.5\]]de nyid ma rtogs par/_/thams cad gcig par rtogs pa med/_/don dam rtogs pa shin tu dka'/_/byis ba rgyan po rtse ba 'dra/_/tha ka na ni smra bar byed/_/do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu zhes bya ba slob dpon ka na ri nas brgyud pa tha ka nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//_
[\[4a.6\]{D2347}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsAr+ya do ha gI ti ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_spyod pa'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ldong ros kyis ni thig le byas/_/ka tsa ri ni bstan par bya/_/kye ma rtse mos bdud bzhi bcom/_/gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/_
[\[4a.7\]]smra bar byed pa'i khyab 'jug gam/_/drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus/_/kye ma gal te smra ba na/_/'ching bdag gis ni za bar 'gyur/_/ma rungs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bsrungs/_/kye ma rmongs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/glags tshol bsam pas ci zhig bya/_/kye ho byol song
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]mkha' 'gro ma/_/glags tshol bsam pas ci zhig bya/_/kye ho 'bar ba'i mer ma dug_/gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/smra bar byed pa khyab 'jug gam/_/drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus/_/ji ltar spu gri ral gri'i so/_/de bzhin la ba pa yi zhabs/_/dam tshig spyod pa
[\[4b.2\]]ngo mtshar che/_/gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/smra bar byed pa khyab 'jug gam/_/drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus/_/spyod pa'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba slob dpon kaM ka ba la nas brgyud slob dpon kad+ka nas gsungs pa rdzogs so//[ {D2348}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sa ha dzA A nan+da gI ti ka dr-iSh+Ti nA ma/_

[\[4b.4\]]mug gnas su ngag_/tshom bu 'di la dbye ba'am/_/rin gyi grangs kyis chod pa med/_/da ni bdag gi tshem bu 'di/_/nam mkha' dang ni mnyam par 'gyur/_/tshem bu thob par 'gyur ba na/_/chags sdang gti mug gnas su dag_/b+ha d+he tshem bu tshol du phyin/_/thams cad du
[\[4b.5\]]ni btsal bas na/_/bdag nyid kyang ni dmigs med 'gyur/_/tshom bu thob par 'gyur ba na/_/chags sdang gti mug gnas su dag_/lhan cig skyes dga'i do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes pa slob dpon b+ha d+hes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D2349}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_su
[\[4b.6\]]ga ta dr-iSh+Ta gI ti ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_bde gshegs kyi lta ba'i glu zhes bya ba/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/thams cad du ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/skye 'gag sdug bsngal sgrol phyir mdzad/_/d+ha ma pa ni smra bar byed/_/bde gshegs

[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]ni rtswa yi tshogs/_/ji ltar srang la gzhal lam ci/_/de bzhin phyi rol thams cad kyis/_/lta ba 'di dang mnyam ma ma ci/_/d+ha ma pa ni smra bar byed/_/bde gshegs spyi bor bkur ba yis/_/bdag gis don dam de nyid rtogs/_/nor bu rin chen bor nas ni/_/su dbang
[\[5a.2\]]mching bu len par byed/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni/_/brtags na bden gnyis yin par smra/_/d+ha ma pa ni smra bar byed/_/bde gshegs spyi bor bkur ba yis/_/bdag gis don dam de nyid rtogs/_/bde gshegs kyi lta ba'i glu zhes bya ba slob dpon d+ha ma pas mdzad pa rdzogs
[\[5a.3\]]so//_/[{D2350}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bA yu ta twaM do ha gI ti ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_rlung gi de nyid kyi do ha'i glu zhes bya ba/_gnyis med bde chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/brtan g.yo rlung gi gzhal yas khang /_/sems kyi rdo rje gdan du bzhugs/_/stong pa nyid ni zab mo la/_/_
[\[5a.4\]]kye ho lhan cig skyes pa yi/_/dga' mo bdag gi dpang du gsol/_/srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na/_/slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur/_/skye bo lhan cig skyes pa yi/_/mdzes ma bdag gi dpang du gsol/_/khyed ni bzhugs na bdag gis ni/_/ji ltar bdag gis gzhan la btsal/_/_
[\[5a.5\]]gru ni 'bying bar 'gyur ba la/_/yongs su drang bar 'dod pa la/_/kye ho lhan cig skyes pa yi/_/dga' mo bdag gi dpang du gsol/_/srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na/_/slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur/_/khyed kyi slad du bdag gis ni/_/rigs lnga'i grong ni bsang byas kyang /_/khyod
[\[5a.6\]]kyi zhal ni bdag gis ni/_/skad cig gcig kyang ma mthong ngo /_/kye ho lhan cig skyes pa yi/_/dga' mo bdag gi dpang du gsol/_/srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na/_/slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur/_/kye ho lhan cig skyes pa yi/_/mdzes ma bdag gi dpang du gsol/_/khyed
[\[5a.7\]]kyi slad du bdag gis ni/_/phyag rgya dgos te cung tsam yang /_/rigs ngan bram ze'i bsam pa med/_/kye ho lhan cig skyes pa yi/_/dga' mo bdag gi dpang du gsol/_/srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na/_/slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho'i nang du gzings bcas pa/_/_

[\[5b.1\]]thod pa can na ka h+Na las/_/ma his gdams ngag thob par 'gyur/_/srid pa'i bcing ba yongs su bcad/_/kye ho lhan cig skyes pa yi/_/mdzes ma bdag gi dpang du gsol/_/rlung gi de nyid kyi do ha'i glu zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po nas brgyud pa slob dpon ma hi bas mdzad
[\[5b.2\]]pa rdzogs so//[ {D2351}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ba san+ti ti la ka do ha gI ti ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpyid kyi thig le do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/se b+hu sku gsum la sogs kyi/_/sos ka'i me tog mthong ba yi/_/gzhon nu bdag
[\[5b.3\]]ni myos par 'gyur/_/he ru ka la chags pa yis/_/sos ka'i dang po dang po 'dir/_/khyod kyis bdag ni bsrung bar mdzod/_/gdung bas 'gum par ma mdzad cig_/me tog aM b+ha ka ru Na/_/dri bsung ldan pas dgyes par 'gyur/_/sha ris pas ni brdungs pas brdungs/_/me mar
[\[5b.4\]]khur nas tsaN+Da lI/_/ri mo bdag la 'bab bo zhes/_/ka na pa ni gshegs par re/_/so ga'i dang po dpyid dus la/_/khyod kyis bdag ni bsrung bar mdzod/_/gdung bas 'gum par ma mdzad cig_/phyogs bcur bltas na bdag gis ni/_/khyod las gzhan ni mthong ba med/_/gdung
[\[5b.5\]]ba'i mo yis bdag gis ni/_/bdag gi lus kyang bsam pa med/_/rnal 'byor ma brgyad las bzhi ni/_/bdag cag gsol ba btab pa yis/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs par mdzod/_/dpyid kyi thig le do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po nas brgyud pa slob dpon sar
[\[5b.6\]]has mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D2352}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra tsa tur gI ti ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_rdo rje bzhi'i glu zhes bya ba/_dpal sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi mthun sems ni khyod ma bsgom/_/de nyid de bzhin nyid ma 'dzin/_/'bras bu re ba sgom ma byed/_/_
[\[5b.7\]]mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po bsgom/_/gal te mnol la gnas med na/_/de ni dpal gyi theg chen min/_/'bras bu re ba sgom ma byed/_/mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po bsgom/_/phung po khams te phyag rgya che/_/dam tshig 'khor lo de rang bzhin/_/'bras bu re ba sgom ma byed/_/mi_
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]dmigs phyag rgya chen po bsgom/_/gnyis med yon tan rgyal 'di yin/_/gnyis med yon tan rnal 'byor gsung /_/'bras bu re ba sgom ma byed/_/mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po bsgom/_/shA ri'i yul du sku 'khrungs pa/_/a ba d+hU tI gnyis med rdo rjes
[\[6a.2\]]mdzad pa a ma ra sing gi glu rdzogs so//[ {D2353}]@##/_/gang yang mi skye mi 'gag dngos po bcing ba med/_/khams gsum grol med 'khrul pa rnams la snang /_/rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na
[\[6a.3\]]rnyed mi 'gyur/_/dngos rnams gdod nas skye med mthong ba gang zhig yin/_/su zhig skye bar 'gyur dang 'gag dang bcing ba sems/_/rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur/_/sems ni nam mkha' dri med
[\[6a.4\]]dang 'dra slob dpon gsung /_/srid pa gsum po de 'dra'i rang bzhin yin/_/rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur/_/rang bzhin mi rtog rang rig nyams su myong bas 'grub/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal 'khrul pas
[\[6a.5\]]ci phyir rmongs par 'gyur/_/rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur/_/bla ma mai tri'i glu rdzogs so//[ {D2354}]@##/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zab mo zab mo 'jig rten kun smra yang /_/_
[\[6a.6\]]ma skyes pa la dga' ba 'ga' zhig 'dug_/kye sems kyi zab mo shes par dka' bas na/_/lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin/_/mi gnas sems ni mi dmigs pa la bzhag_/rnal 'byor me yis dngos po thams cad bsreg_/kye sems kyi zab mo shes par dka' bas
[\[6a.7\]]na/_/lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin/_/rnal 'byor 'dod pa bla mas bstan du med/_/bla ma'i byin rlabs gong na med pa len/_/kye sems kyi zab mo shes par dka' bas na/_/lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin/_/dpal gyi bde ba chen po tshol 'dod na/_/_

[\[36a.1\]]byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D2418}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bA yu bo d+hi tsit+ta sra ba na b+ha ba na u pA yaM nA ma/_bod skad du/_byang chub sems kyi rlung rgyu ba'i gdams ngag bsgom pa zhes bya ba/_dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang lus khong stong

[\[37a.1\]]stong dag la bza' bar bya/_/skyur rtsang bcud can kha zas btang /_/zla ba drug tu zos gyur na/_/nad rnams sel cing nyis brgya thub/_/'bras bu gsum dang lcags phye dang /_/de bzhin b+h+r-id gar dza dang /_/ru rta dang ni cha mnyam ste/_/b+h+r-i da ga'i khu bas lde gur sbyar/_/_

[\[37a.4\]]bza' bar bya/_/mig rno nad med sum brgya thub/_/tho rangs a ru gnyis dag dang /_/nyi ma phyed la ba ru ste/_/zhag dus skyu ru bzhi dag za/_/drug cu'i 'bras dang 'o ma yi/_/rnal 'byor kha zas ci nus btang /_/skra dkar gnyer ma nad med pas/_/'dod pa'i dbang phyug nad med

[\[54a.1\]]dor bya sbangs pa yin/_/nom ba lus la med pa'i skyes bu gcer bu pa la dgra mi yong /_/dur khrod dbus kyi rdo yi mi de sha za'i ya nga bral nas 'dug_/chu shing snying po rnyed pa'i mi de skyes bu su yis mthong bar 'gyur/_/gter mdzod dbyig gis khengs tshe de dus ded dpon blo sems bde

[\[54a.7\]]yang ltos/_/tshong khang du tshogs 'gron bo thad kar mi 'grogs rang rang gud du 'gro/_/nor bu'i phung po mthong tshe rus sbal la ni gces par 'dzin pa'i blo mi skye/_/klu mchog rnams kyi mgo bo ji snyed klad gzer skye ba'i rten/_/nang gi 'du ba gang yin rang srong gis ni phyi nas shes/_/rgyal po'i

[\[54b.1\]]dkor mdzod brkus pa mi smra 'chab pas kha tshags bsdams/_/snal chu mthong tshe thag pa sprul du 'dzin pa'i 'khrul pa ldog_/sbrang rtsi'i ro mchog myong ba'i rnga mo rtswa yi zhen pa bral/_/sa yi 'og tu rno yi ngar blud spu gri sba bar 'phangs pa yin/_/nyi zla gza' skar rnams ni rgya mtsho dang ba'i ngang du

[\[59a.1\]]mos rnyed kyang nor bu rje bos 'khyer/_/na so rgas pa'i ded dpon gling mi lon/_/bu yis brdungs kyang tsha bo gcis par 'dzin/_/dur khrod nang du seng ge'i rtsal mi 'byongs/_/wa dom spyod pas sder chags zil mi non/_/grum pa dang 'grogs snying stobs

[\[59a.7\]]me tog mi btog bcad par phangs/_/shing lo'i steng na dur srung yan lag dal/_/bud med khyim gyis sun pa de la ltos/_/stobs kyis 'khrul pa'i 'khor lo'i gshog pa brel/_/rtsi yis zin pa'i lcags 'di gser du 'gyur/_/gser langs sa bon yongs su bsngo mi bya/_/_

[\[59b.1\]]nam mkha'i ngang la shar lho phyogs mtshams med/_/dar gyi tshes kyis shel gong kha dog bsgyur/_/mdog dbyibs tha dad sprin gyi yal sa mkha'/_/mo gsham bu yi bag mangs ma mthong /_/kAR+ShA pa Ni sa dung gi kha dog mtshon/_/nam mkha' skyed par byed pa'i 'am su/_/'jig

[\[64a.1\]]me shel grang mo me nyid yin/_/gsungs so//_//mkha' 'gro ma thod phreng rtsal gyis mgur bzhengs pa/_hUM dngas pa'i chu la rlung gis bskyod/_/chab rom gzugs kyi rnam par shar/_/nam mkha' phyogs 'dzin lung pas byas/_/gzugs med gzugs
[\[64a.2\]]kyi do bor snang /_/nyi ma'i 'od la sprin gyis bsgribs/_/sred gsum mun rum chen por gyur/_/chu bo rnyogs pas gzugs brnyan subs/_/mig gis mig nyid ma mthong bar/_/klu rgyal gtsug gi nor bu bzhin/_/rang gi srog ni rang gis bcad/_/gsungs so//_//mkha'
[\[64a.3\]]'gro ma dpal gyi rdo rjes mgur bzhengs ba/_hUM grib mas gzugs nyid mi gtong na/_/dug zos zhu rjes ci ru 'gyur/_/byi la ri dug ni dran pas phung /_/nam mkha' rtsad bzhag dus su smin/_/sa bon 'phel stobs rab tu che/_/smin pas phung ba smyug ma'i 'bru/_/bsags pas
[\[64a.4\]]bcings pa bung ba'i rtsi/_/yod pas sbyangs pa dmangs bo'i nor/_/rang gis bslus pa srin gyi kha/_/rang la smin pa sdig pa'i bu/_/gsungs so//_//mkha' 'gro ma tshogs kyi rje mos mgur bzhengs pa/_glang ni zla bo rnyed pas nyos/_/mgo tom bde ba sdug bsngal yin/_/_
[\[64a.5\]]glang po gser gyi sgrog la dga'/_/dmyal ba'i lus la bde ba med/_/yi dgas bkres shing skom pas gdungs/_/khra yis ded pa'i bye'u dang /_/ma he'i rdzi'u sems khral che/_/bu shi'i mya ngan yid la gcags/_/rang srog dor ba'i dpa' bo blun/_/mdze po'i so skos soms dang
[\[64a.6\]]kye/_/gsungs so//_//mkha' 'gro ma dkar mos mgur bzhengs pa/_hUM gdan sar bton pa'i rgyal bu yis/_/grogs po mi gnyis khrid byas te/_/'dab ma bzhi pa'i lde mig gis/_/'khor yug sdom pa'i lcags phye la/_/nyin mtshan gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/_/re chas
[\[64a.7\]]spang khung bshig nas ni/_/rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye la/_/yid bzhin nor bu blta bar bya/_/lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i skyes bu yis/_/nor bu rin chen blangs nas kyang /_/mchan khung gnyis su sba bar bya/_/khrus byas rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar/_/dgos 'dod 'byung phyir
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]gsol ba gdab/_/gsungs so//_//mkha' 'gro ma nyi zla'i mig can gyis mgur bzhengs pa/_hUM mkha' la nyi zla shar ba yis/_/mun pa ma spangs snang bar gyur/_/gser 'gyur rtsi yi mkhan po 'am/_/g.ya' dang bral ba'i me long bzhin/_/sgron me thogs pas
[\[64b.2\]]mun pa bral/_/chu yi gzugs brnyan btsags pas stong /_/ka la ku Ta ming yin te/_/nam mkha' mthong bas ji ltar rig_/tshad pas gdungs pas chab rom zhu/_/na bun skyi ser rlung gis phyags/_/gsungs so//_//mkha' 'gro ma mig ngan mas mgur bzhengs pa/_
[\[64b.3\]]hUM me long zad nas gzugs brnyan 'gags/_/mtsho la dar zhig 'gro lam stong /_/gnyid sad skyes bus yul ma mthong /_/skar tshogs nyi ma'i zer gyis non/_/mkha' la gzugs shar khol ma'i nang /_/khong du chang 'thungs nyam nga bral/_/me chu rlung gis srid gsum
[\[64b.4\]]stong /_/gsungs so//_//mkha' 'gro ma bung ba'i mchu can gyis mgur bzhengs pa/_hUM nags kyi glang po smyo bas 'tshengs/_/ri dgas dman mas g.yeng ba spangs/_/dur srung mi la so nam med/_/ne tsho smra ma shes pas 'tshengs/_/mi gtsang khrod nas ut+pal 'khrungs/_/_
[\[64b.5\]]sha ba'i ra ni bog na bde/_/khur po med na 'jigs dang bral/_/nor med mi yis mel tshe spangs/_/nags kyi me ni rlung gis spor/_/lus ngag bkol bas 'tsho ba rnyed/_/gsungs so//_//mkha' 'gro ma nam mkha' dbang phyug mas mgur bzhengs pa/_mkha' la 'byung bzhi'i
[\[64b.6\]]nye ring med/_/rmi lam nor la zhen chags med/_/btso ma'i gser la dri ma med/_/glang po rwa med chag dogs med/_/gling lon ded dpon 'dod sems med/_/me dpung dkyil na sgog chags med/_/mo gsham bu la yang rtsal med/_/sbal pa'i kha la smra brjod med/_/me long
[\[64b.7\]]nang na gzugs brnyan med/_/mkha' la bya 'phur rten sa med/_/gsungs so/_/mkha' 'gro ma brda'i mgur chung gsang mdzod 'phrul gyi rgya khyad par du gyur pa'i brgyud pa zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o//[ {D2442}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra DA ki nA gI ti nA ma/_bod skad du/_
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i mgur zhes bya ba/_rje btsun ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas rtogs pa'i lta ba'i brda bstan pa/_gser gyi ral gri til ngar ldan pa da phyung la/_/bung bas me tog rtsi bcud ma lus myang bar gyis/_/chu bran sna tshogs rgya mtshor
[\[65a.2\]]gcig go lan tshwa'i ro/_/me long bzhin ni byad yin gud du ma sems cig_/chu yi zla ba 'di la byis pa ltad mo byed //bu ram gzugs 'di tha dad snang yang mngar ba'i ro/_/nam mkha' gzugs su mthong ba'i byis pa snying re rje/_/ri bo rlung gis bskyod du med pa shin tu gces/_/_
[\[65a.3\]]ta la'i sdong po bregs na mgo rtsa gnyis ka skam/_/nam mkha'i kha dog rkyen kyis 'gyur ba ngo mtshar che/_/'dab chags mkha' la gnas kyang grib ma sa la rgyu/_/shel gye kong bu'i mar me 'di la dri ma med/_/rmi lam sad pa'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde/_/gzings la gnas
[\[65a.4\]]pa'i bya rog gang bder 'gro bar gyis/_/khang stong nang gi khyi rkun 'di ni ltad mor che/_/shel la tshon gyis bskus kyang gting nas 'gyur ba med/_/rang gis bsags pa'i gser la ka 'jis brdar mi dgos/_/ded dpon lam rgyus can dang 'grogs na nor bu lon/_/drang srong nags la
[\[65a.5\]]chud pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che/_/ku sha rlung gis bsgul ba'i rtsa ba a re 'khrul/_/gdeng med gyad kyi spyod pa byed pa snying re rje/_/sman dug 'dres pa 'di yi gnyis ka'i nus pa nyams/_/glang po'i gzugs brnyan 'di la khal gyi nus pa med/_/rin chen snod du bzhag nas 'tsho ba grong du
[\[65a.6\]]slong /_/nam mkha' gos su gyon nas 'byung ba gnas su thim/_/khur bar chu blugs skyes bu de yis smra ma shes/_/rgyal po'i rjes gnang thob pas gshed ma la mi 'jigs/_/ral gri'i 'khor los mtshon cha gang yin gtub par byed/_/'dab ma gnyis dang ldan pa'i sems can mkha'
[\[65a.7\]]la 'gro/_/a ma mthong ba'i byis pa gzhan gyis 'khrid du med/_/sa bon rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi nus pa mkha' la bskams/_/nyi ma mkha' la shar ba'i rgyu skar zil gyis gnon/_/snying phyung de nas yan lag g.yob par ga la nus/_/mtho yor mi ru shes pas de tshe 'jigs dang bral/_/_
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]sbrul nag mtshon gyis zin na dug gi gnod pa bral/_/rtsi yi rgyal pos 'bru rnams bcud du sgyur bar byed/_/rgyal bu pha dgos bzang po 'di la rtsol ba med/_/dbul po rin chen gling du sna tshogs thabs kyis zhugs//'thor rlung chen pos stong gsum 'jig rten g.yeng bar byed/_/dus
[\[65b.2\]]mtha'i me yis srid gsum sreg par the tshom med/_/bskal pa'i chu yis snod bcud ma lus gzhi nas 'khru/_/zhes gsungs so//_//lta ba'i brda rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas mkha' 'gros ting 'dzin nyams kyi brda bstan pa/_drod
[\[65b.3\]]gsher ldan pa de tshe sa bon gdab pa'i dus/_/sa bon skyed med btab pas myu gu bskyed du sla/_/gyen thur lam la chu bo 'bab par 'gyur/_/nags tshal khrod du shing rta 'dren pa'i skyes bu blun/_/rin chen sna bdun ldan na 'khor los sgyur rgyal rgyu/_/so ma btang ba'i rdza ni chu la reg pas
[\[65b.4\]]'jig_/seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan nang du blugs mi bya/_/dbul po'i lus 'di dal bar mi bzhag cis kyang bkol/_/sna tshogs rgyu las sgra snyan 'byung ba ngo mtshar che/_/zhun sbyong lags pa'i rin chen 'di ni bkol na bde/_/so mtshams srung ba'i skyes bu 'di la dngul chu blud/_/nad
[\[65b.5\]]kyis gdungs par gyur na thur ma gtad par bya/_/nor bu rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar nas kyang /_/mchod pa byas na dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'a ma srin mos khyer ba 'di ni dran gyis la/_/skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas seng ge'i gsob gon nas/_/nyi zla'i steng du
[\[65b.6\]]dpa' bo'i gdong la blta bar bya/_/rgyal po'i rkun mo gang yin de ni rtsad bcad nas/_/gyad kyi nor bu 'di ni thabs kyis btsal bar bya/_/glang chen smyon pa mi rtse yan du bcug pas srun/_/chu yi rnyog ma ma bsgul bzhag pas rim gyis dngas/_/bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems
[\[65b.7\]]bde/_/lan tshwa'i rdog po 'di la chu'i thigs pa gzan/_/chab rom nyi mas gdungs pa 'di ni chu ru 'gro/_/dug la sngags kyis btab pa 'di ni sman gyi mchog_/lbu ba chu yin 'di la tha dad yod ma yin/_/sprin rnams gtor ba'i rlung po 'di la nan tan bskyed/_/gsal bya gsal

[\[66a.1\]]byed med pa'i sgron me bde ba che/_/chu bo cha dang rtag tu 'grogs pa shin tu gces/_/'gro ba bzang mo'i mya ngan 'di ni yid la zhog_/nam mkha' yid can 'di ni shar gyi phyogs su 'gro//_//zhes bsgom pa'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur/_bam po gnyis

[\[66a.3\]]sna tshogs brten/_/nags kyi me la rkyen rnams sna tshogs grogs su 'ong /_/gzhon nu ma yi bde ba khyod kyis smra nus sam/_/nam mkha'i ri mo 'di la gces par ma 'dzin cig_/skyi ser 'di yis chu yi lbu ba dbyings su bdas/_/nam mkha'i sgron me dus rnams kun du sbar bar bya/_/dngul
[\[66a.4\]]gyi me long 'di ni yengs pa med par phyi/_/ri rab mthon po'i rtse la byin pa 'di ci sems/_/bung rtsis myos pa 'di yis ci smras smyon pa'i tshig_/nad rnams 'byin pa'i sman mchog skran du gyur pa yod/_/pad+ma'i rtsi bcud 'thungs pa'i bung ba phyir mi lta/_/shel gyi mchod rten ma mthong bar
[\[66a.5\]]du lta ba gces/_/sgron me lag na thogs pa'i skyes bu snang lam bde/_/khang du seng ge'i snying gis rtag tu brgyal bar 'gyur/_/gser 'gyur rtsi yis dngos po bzang ngan med par 'joms/_/chu bo chen po zhon nas nam mkha'i bya lam snyag_/chu bo'i rgyun chad de dus rang thag 'khor mi nus/_/'khor
[\[66a.6\]]lo'i srub thag chad pa'i rdza mkhan blo sems bde/_/sprin gyis nam mkha'i ngang las byung zhing de ru dengs/_/bltas kyi bltas kyi nam mkha' 'di ni mthong ba 'gags//_//nyams kyi brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur/_bam po gsum pa/_/skyes bu nad kyis zin pa'i blo sems dran
[\[66a.7\]]gyis la/_/dur khrod wa mo 'di yi spyod 'gros blta bar bya/_/nags tshal khrod na ri dgas dman ma gnas pa ltos/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di ni su la'ang 'jigs pa med/_/rdo yi mi la 'gran par nus pa ngo mtshar che/_/nags na gnas pa'i spre'u 'di yi spyod pa 'am//yang na rgyal bu
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]gzhon nu 'di la blta bar bya/_/mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya bran 'di 'dra ci yi phyir/_/'bru yi mdzod du bkres pas nyen pa snying re rje/_/phye ma leb kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra su yis phod/_/dong gi btson 'di thar ram yid la bya bar rigs/_/sdug bsngal rgyan du mthong ba'i glang po sgog la dga'/_/mtsho
[\[66b.2\]]yi nang nas smig rgyu snyag pa'i ri dgas snying re rje/_/rin chen gling nas stong log byed pa'i ded dpon blun/_/nam mkha'i rlung dang 'grogs pa phyogs bzhir kun du rgyug_/glang chen shugs kyis bag ma tshobs la khyi sha zo/_/smyon pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas nam mkha' sman mchog ster/_/_
[\[66b.3\]]nags la gnas pa'i ri dgas 'di ni yan par bye/_/'dab chags mkha' la rgyu ba 'di yi rkang rjes ltos/_/ral gri lag na thogs pa'i mi de gang phrad gsod/_/gyad kyi spyod pa 'di la sems can phra mo skrag_/khyi phag gnyis kyis bram ze'i gsang tshig rlung la bskur/_/mi mgo skam
[\[66b.4\]]po la ni shing gi skyes bu dga'/_/gyi ling sgrog dang bral na kun du rgyug par rigs/_/kha ba'i nus pa mtsho la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/shing lo rlung gis khyer ba 'di yi rtsad mi chod/_/nyi zla lta bur gyur na skar ma'i tshogs dang 'grogs/_/gru pa 'di yis skya ba nya ra bya bar rigs/_/_
[\[66b.5\]]dug 'di rma bya'i zas yin gzhan rnams phung bar byed/_/'dab gshog med par mkha' la 'gro ba dor bar bya//_//spyod pa'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur/_bam po bzhi pa/_shel sgong yongs su dag na 'od zer nang nas 'char/_/nam mkha'i gter la spyod pa'i skyes
[\[66b.6\]]bu dbul dang bral/_/snying gi dbus su pad+ma'i ge sar smin par sla/_/drod tshad ldan pa'i 'o ma rtsol bas mar du 'gyur/_/stong pa'i snod 'di nam chag tshe na nam mkha' 'dres/_/'ja' tshon dus kyi mkha' la yal ba rnyed mi 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'di 'dra ngo mtshar che/_/_
[\[66b.7\]]'khor los sgyur rgyal sna tshogs gnas nas bsdu ba mdzad/_/rgun 'brum 'bras bu bsgul bas mi smin bzhag na smin/_/nor bu yon tan sus byin 'di yi bsam pa ci/_/nyi zla mkha' la 'char ba 'di la rnam rtog med/_/stong pa'i cho 'phrul 'di yis lo tog 'bras bu smin/_/nam mkha'i

[\[67a.1\]]dbyings 'di sna tshogs ston pa gang gi rkyen/_/chu snod du ma'i zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shes par kyis//_//'bras bu'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur/_bam po lnga pa/_mkha' 'gro ma'i brda bam po lnga pa zhes bya ba gsang mdzod na shog dril du gnas
[\[67a.2\]]pa las/_dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang /_slad kyi ding ri zla 'khor du zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur nas bla ma byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtad/_'di khyad par gyi mgur chen po brgyad las brda skor rnam pa bzhi rdzogs so//_//_

[\[67b.3\]]ba/_dri med shel sgong dag pa gcig_/tshon gyi rkyen gyis sna tshogs 'char/_/bar snang khams su 'jog shes na/_/gtan gyi bde ba de las 'byung /_/gsung ngo //_//shAn+ti bas gsungs pa/_gnas na zhog la 'gro na thong /_/gnyer ka ma byed yan du chug_/ched du
[\[67b.4\]]gang 'dzin 'khrul pa yin/_/gzings la 'phur ba'i bya rog ltos/_/gsung ngo //_//biR+Wa pas gsungs pa/_gang gang mthong ba de de nyid/_/dran pa'i rtsi dang ma bral bar/_/ci rigs par ni nyams su long /_/gser 'gyur rtsi yi mkhan po ltos/_/gsung ngo //_//_
[\[67b.5\]]ye shes zhabs kyis gsungs pa/_/snying phyung skyes bus yan lag g.yob par mi nus bzhin/_/sems nyid rtsa ba bral na rtog pas bcing du med/_dug gi sngags can du gnyid sman du 'gyur ba bzhin/_/thabs dang ldan pas nyon mongs nyid ni byang chub rgyu/_/gsung ngo //_//shAn+ta de

[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]tog tse bas gsungs pa/_gang la nges shes skyes pas rtsa ba zin/_/de bas lhag pa'i ngo sprod gzhan yod min/_/snang dang srid pa'i chos rnams thams cad la/_/bla mar ma gyur pa ni yod ma yin/_/gsung ngo //_//nag po zhabs kyis gsungs pa/_me tog sna tshogs
[\[68a.2\]]du ma'i ro/_/bung bas gcig tu sdud pa ltar/_/chos rnams sna tshogs du ma'i ro/_/rtogs dang ldan pas gcig tu bsdus/_/ro ni skye ba med pa'i ro/_/myong ni ngos gzung med par myong /_/gsung ngo //_//nA ga b+hu su kas gsungs pa/_myong ba med pa'i nyams myong la/_/blo dang bral
[\[68a.3\]]bas nyams su blangs/_/rtogs su med par gtan la phab/_/thob tu med par mngon du 'gyur/_/gsung ngo //_//lU yi pas gsungs pa/_gnyug ma'i shes pa 'gyur med mngon du gyur nas kyang /_/rtsol bas sangs rgyas logs su tshol ba ngal ba ste/_/glang po rnyed nas glang po'i
[\[68a.4\]]rjes tshol ji bzhin no/_/nga ni sangs rgyas med par shes pas 'dod blo bral/_/gsung ngo //_//kr-iSh+Na pas gsungs pa/_ngos gzung med par ngo sprad pas/_/stong nyid dang du nyams su myong /_/dran pa'i mel tshe srung mkhas pas/_/'khrul pa'i rkun mos glags ma rnyed/_/rgyun chad med
[\[68a.5\]]par nyams blangs pas/_/'du 'bral med par mngon du gyur/_/gsung ngo //_//in+d+ra b+hu tis gsungs pa/_skyes bu gnyid log 'khrul pas non gyur kyang /_/gnyid sad dus na 'khrul pa yul na med/_/de bzhin ma rtogs 'khor bar sdug bsngal kyang /_/rtogs dang ldan la 'khor
[\[68a.6\]]ba'i yul na med/_/gsung ngo //_//rat+na kIrtis gsungs pa/_nyi ma'i 'od zer kun nas rgyas pa'i dra ba can/_/mun pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad ngo mtshar che/_/rtogs ldan bla ma thugs rje'i 'od zer dra ba can/_/gdul bya'i blo yi mun sel 'di ni ngo mtshar che/_/gsung ngo //_//_
[\[68a.7\]]kau ka tas gsungs pa/_dbang bzhis smin pa'i bu la nyams kyi gdams pa yod/_/thos pas sgro 'dogs chod la tshig gi gdams pa yod/_/bla mas thugs la btags la gnad kyi gdams pa yod/_/'khrul pa gong du bshig la mtshang gi gdams pa yod/_/gsung ngo //_//_
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]sa ha dzas gsungs pa/_bu nyon khyod kyis nam mkha'i dkyil du ltos/_/lho sprin mi dga' 'di ni nam mkha'i cho 'phrul yin/_/'ja' tshon 'di la bden par ma 'dzin par/_/chu bo chen po'i rgyun la zhon la shar du rgyug/_/gsung ngo //_//glang chen gos kyis gsungs pa/_rtsi yi
[\[68b.2\]]rgyal pos 'bru rnams bcud du 'gyur ba bzhin/_/nyams myong rtsi yis snang srid bde ba chen por 'bar/_/gang gang mthong ba de de skye med spros dang bral/_/'di la ngos 'dzin med pas stong pa btsal mi dgos/_/gsung ngo //_//b+ha su d+ha ris gsungs pa/_'gro ba thams cad
[\[68b.3\]]bde bar gshegs/_/snang ba thams cad chos kyi sku/_/'dod yon thams cad sems kyi rgyan/_/rtog tshogs thams cad ye shes che/_/gsung ngo //_//he ru ka pas gsungs pa/_lus la ye shes chen po gnas/_/bla ma'i kha las gsal bar rtogs/_/gzhan gyis brjod
[\[68b.4\]]min gnyug ma'i don/_/'di ni ma bcos rang byung ba'o/_/gsung ngo //_//ka na ko tis gsungs pa/_srid pa'i me yis dngos po thams cad bsregs pa ltar/_/rtogs pa'i me yis bdag tu 'dzin pa bsregs nas kyang /_/'khor ba'i bud shing ma lus gtan nas 'joms par byed/_/_
[\[68b.5\]]de nas 'gro ba'i don du ci bder gshegs pa yin/_/gsung ngo //_//nyi ma'i rtsal gyis gsungs pa/_sna tshogs sems kyi cho 'phrul te/_/sems ni 'di zhes mtshon du med/_/de phyir 'khor 'das rtsa ba bral/_/de nyid chos skur shes par gyis/_/gsung ngo //_//rin chen rdo rjes
[\[68b.6\]]gsungs pa/_nges shes las ni don mthong 'gyur/_/mos gus las ni byin rlabs 'byung /_/brtson 'grus kyis ni dgos pa grub/_/gsung ngo //_//tre'u tra bas gsungs pa/_rig pa khong nas ma sad na/_/'di zhes bstan pas rtogs mi 'gyur/_/mig nad can gyi snang ba bzhin/_/_
[\[68b.7\]]thog mar rang rgyud bsal bar bya/_/gsung ngo //_//yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes gsungs pa/_mthong ba mngon du ma gyur na/_/mig gi dbang pos yul mthong bzhin/_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung bas/_/goms par bya ba shin tu gces/_/gsung ngo //_//dza ba ri pas gsungs
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]pa/_sku gsum phyi rol yul na med/_/rig pa'i ye shes dngas pa las/_/gzugs brnyan tsam du nang nas 'char/_/rnam par rtog pas rnyog mi bya/_/gsung ngo //_//gu d+ha ri pas gsungs pa/_snang srid ye grol chos kyi dbyings/_/phyag rgya chen po
[\[69a.2\]]spang thob med/_/nam mkha'i bya yis gar ma phyin/_/byis pa'i rtsol ba sha thang chad/_/gsung ngo //_//lwa ba'i na bza' can gyis gsungs pa/_gang du'ang ma mthong long ba'i mig_/ci yang mi sems gti mug dang /_/gang du ma phyin 'phye bo'i 'gros/_/ci yang ma thob dbul mo'i
[\[69a.3\]]gter/_/gsung ngo //_//Dom+bi he ru kas gsungs pa/_srid zhi mnyam nyid spros bral la/_/rtsol sgrub byed pa sha thang chad/_/yul sems gnyis med zang thal la/_/tha dad 'dzin pa nyon re mongs/_/bdag gzhan gnyis med chos sku la/_/bzang ngan 'dzin pa snying re rje/_/_
[\[69a.4\]]gsung ngo //_//nyi ma sbas pas gsungs pa/_yul la ltos pas skye ba med/_/sems la ltos pas spros dang bral/_/gnyis med don 'di blo las 'das/_/ngas ni ci yang ma shes so/_/gsung ngo //_//gu Na tis gsungs pa/_ma skyes mi g.yo nam mkha'i dang /_/_
[\[69a.5\]]gzugs brnyan sna tshogs cho 'phrul te/_/snyems med rig pa rang sar zhog_/chos kyis bcings pa snying re rje/_/gsung ngo //_//pad+ma'i rdo rjes gsungs pa/_bya ba thams cad yongs btang ste/_/sems kyi glang po rang sar zhog_/gnyis med ye shes btsal du med/_/thams cad
[\[69a.6\]]thams cad de de nyid/_/gsung ngo //_//ti lo pas gsungs ba/_kun gzhi zang thal zhabs phyung la/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa dbyings su bskyur/_/yid kyi rnam shes stod la non/_/sgo lnga rang grol lhag par zhog_/gsung ngo //_//shes rab 'byung gnas kyis gsungs pa/_spros dang
[\[69a.7\]]bral la rtog pas 'ching mi nus/_/sgyu mar mthong la yul gyis 'ching mi nus/_/zhe 'dod bral la spyod pas 'ching mi nus/_/sangs rgyas 'dod la 'khor bas 'ching mi nus/_/gsung ngo //_//dz+nyA na shI sa gsungs pa/_rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong po bzhin/_/nga yi sems nyid nam mkhar
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]stor/_/'khrul snang ji ltar dgyes dgyes mdzod/_/da ni nam mkha'i rnal 'byor yin/_/gsung ngo //_//pa ra he tas gsungs pa/_kang ka mkha' la lding ba bzhin/_/'khor 'das ro mnyam dbyings su grol/_/re dang dogs pa kun bral te/_/bde ba chen po nam mkha'i dang /_/_
[\[69b.2\]]gsung ngo //_//kA ma shrIs gsungs pa/_lus med lus kyi nang na gnas/_/rten med mkha' la bya bzhin rgyu/_/dmigs med smra bsam yul las 'das/_/'gyu med rang byung ye shes cha/_/gsung ngo //_//mi thub zla bas gsungs pa/_sgron me zla ba tshol ba bzhin/_/rtog pa
[\[69b.3\]]de nyid mi rtog pa/_/nam mkhas nam mkha' tshol ba bzhin/_/mi rtog pa nyid blo las 'das/_/gsung ngo //_//dzA lan+d+ha ras gsungs pa/_ye shes med na mthong ba che/_/rtog pa med na gsal ba che/_/zhen pa med na bde ba che/_/gang du'ang mi gnas gnas pa che/_/gsung ngo /_/_
[\[69b.4\]]me tri ka ma las gsungs pa/_sems nyid gzhi stong rtsa ba bral/_/las kyis 'ching bar mi nus te/_dngos por zhen pas de ltar min/_/de ltar rtag tu rang sems ltos/_/gsung ngo /_//_pad+ma badzra gsungs pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi b+ha ga ru/_/rig pa'i rdo rje gsor nas
[\[69b.5\]]kyang /_/gnyis med dang du sbyar byas nas/_/bde chen lhan cig skyes pa 'chang /_/gsung ngo //_//klu'i byang chub kyis gsungs pa/_mkha' la rlung 'phyo srab kyis gzung /_/khang stong khyi yis spyod pa ltos/_/nam mkha'i 'a ma sus mthong ba/_/bu ni bad du rgyug par nges/_/gsung
[\[69b.6\]]ngo //_//'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis gsungs pa/_rin chen gling du phyin na dbul dang bral/_/bla ma'i bka' drin thob na 'khrul pa zhig_/sems kyi de nyid mthong na 'khor ba med/_/byang sems nang du 'byongs na 'gro don 'byung /_/gsung ngo //_//rA dzA ha stis gsungs ba/_/_
[\[69b.7\]]rtogs nas gzhan don mi byed par/_/de ni sa yi gter srung bzhin/_/'di na tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor ba/_/thugs rjes sems can mi 'dzin nam/_/gsung ngo //_//bzang po dpal gyis gsungs pa/_bdag dang sems can dbyer med kyang /_/'gro ba las kyis sdug bsngal

[\[70a.1\]]bas/_/rgyun chad med pa'i thugs rje yis/_/'gro ba'i don la rol tu gsol/_/gsung ngo //_//li la'i bzang pos gsungs pa/_rang la yod kyang ngo ma shes/_/dbul mo gter gyis bslus pa bzhin/_/de nyid ma mthong sems can la/_/thugs rjes sgron me
[\[70a.2\]]gdeg tu gsol/_/gsung ngo //_//rnal 'byor ma dU ti mas gsungs pa/_chab dang chab rom tha dad min/_/snang dang stong pa dbyer mi phyed/_/mkha' dang rlung la bye brag med/_/sems dang sems byung de bzhin no/_/gsung ngo //_//shing lo mas gsungs pa/_brag ca'i sgra
[\[70a.3\]]'di su yis smras/_/me long gzugs brnyan su yis bris/_/rmi lam ltad mo gang du gyes/_/gang na'ang med do sems kyi ngang /_/gsung ngo //_//dur khrod mas gsungs pa/_kun gzhi dag pa chos dbyings yin/_/yin ngo shes pa ye shes yin/_/bdag 'dzin zhig na rtsa bral
[\[70a.4\]]yin/_/sgo lnga rang grol lam khyer yin/_/gsung ngo //_//gcer bu mas gsungs pa/_rang grol blo dang bral ba la/_/mi bcos sgo gsum lhag par zhog_/mi zhen dgag bsgrub med par zhog_/mi g.yo mnyam nyid chen por bzhag_/gsung ngo //_//ro langs mas gsungs

[\[70b.1\]]gsal che/_/chu bo chu bo rgyun chad med/_/'ja' tshon rang grol bde ba che/_/gsung ngo //_//gsal byed mas gsungs pa/_/go ru med pa'i don rtogs na/_/brjod du med pa'i gleng gzhi 'byung /_/bsam du med pa'i don bsgoms na/_/thob tu med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung /_/gsung ngo //_//bye ma lung pas

[\[70b.4\]]yal/_/gsung ngo //_//gri skor mas gsungs pa/_ming dang bral ba'i ming mang pos/_/der 'dzin zhig pa'i blo bral po/_/yongs su grol ba'i byar med bo/_/ye yin chen por rtogs par gyis/_/gsung ngo //_//lam skyes mas gsungs pa/_dmigs bya dmigs byed
[\[70b.5\]]mtha' spangs te/_/ting 'dzin rten dang bral ba la/_/chu bo chen po'i rgyun bzhin du/_/ma yengs nyams su blang bar bya/_/gsung ngo //_//bshes gnyen mas gsungs pa/_nam mkha'i bya lam rjes med bzhin/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa rjes med yin/_/rang rgyud 'dzin pa med gyur na/_/_

[\[71a.2\]]ngo //_//lha sras dpal gzher gyis gsungs pa/_stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i shul yin te/_/gol sa med par gsungs pas na/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan par bya/_/gsung ngo //_//rdo rje bde bas gsungs pa/_mi g.yo bsam gtan rgya

[\[82a.1\]]rlung gis ma bskyod par/_/'khor lo'i srub thag gcad par bya/_/sprin med mkha' la nyi shar bzhin/_/lho sprin rlung gis brda bar bya/_/'ja' tshon 'di yis byis ba bslus/_/so mtshams mkhar gyi bdag po ltos/_/rin chen gter gyi me la tshe gyis/_/_
[\[82a.2\]]nam mkhas nam mkha' grol bar nges/_/zhes rngon pa ba chen pos ka ma la shI la la lam gyi brda bstan pa'o//_//dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mkha' 'gros byin brlabs nyams kyi brda/_/dkar po'i zla ba rim pa ste/_/'ja' tshon nam mkha' nyid la mdzes/_/_
[\[82a.3\]]gzhon nus smras pa ci ste go/_/chus bkang nas ni smrar mi btub/_/khug rna dang ba'i rnam pa bzhin/_/dbul mo gter ldan ngo mtshar che/_/lan tshwa chu bo nyid la thim/_/bya ni mkha' las 'da' mi nus/_/dgras bslus gnyen la'ang yid ma gtod/_/ral gri ngar ldan ngo
[\[82a.4\]]mtshar che/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jigs mi byed/_/wa yis seng ge skrag pa min/_/bya ni mkha' la rtsol sgrub med/_/mkha' dang cho 'phrul tha dad min/_/nam mkha' gang gis za bar nus/_/chu ni ma rnyog bzhag na dngas/_/'di nyid yin dang ma yin zhes/_/sus byas
[\[82a.5\]]su yis go ba su/_/zhes rngon pa ba chen pos ka ma la shI la la nyams kyi brda bstan pa'o//_//dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mkha' 'gros byin brlabs gnad kyi brda/_/seng ge glang chen phag rgod bsad/_/rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong po bzhin/_/nags kyi ri dgas gal
[\[82a.6\]]la tshud/_/gzings kyi bya rog gar bder thong /_/dngas ma'i chur ni gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/mkha' la tshon gyis bskur mi nus/_/ri bo rlung gis bsgul ba min/_/rgya mtsho chen po gting mi g.yo/_/snying chung de ni skal bar ldan/_/seng ge'i gsob la byis pa 'jigs/_/bung
[\[82a.7\]]ba'i spyod pa yid kyis ltos/_/bu shi'i mya ngan sems la zhog_/sgron me lag tu thogs pa'i mi/_/kun gyi sna la 'gro bar gyis/_/de nas nam mkha'i phyi nang 'dre/_/zhes gsungs te/_rngon pa ba chen pos ka ma la shi la la gnad kyi gdams pa bstan pa'o//_//_
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]{D2448}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsit+ta gu h+ya gam+b+hI rAr+tha gI ti nA ma/_bod skad du/_sems kyi gsang ba zab don brda'i glur blangs pa zhes bya ba/_sha ba ri dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kye ho chu dang 'o ma so sor nam mkha'i mthongs su bsres pa rtog med dang pa'i mchu des bsdus nas
[\[82b.2\]]song /_/'dab chags 'ug pa'i mig gis sna tshogs mun pa'i khrod na snang ba so sor mthong ba phyi rol min/_/'dab chags ne tsos nyi ma'i 'od la rtsi shing nags khrod mthong la dga' zhing rtse la lhag par chags/_/rma bya dug gi lo ma zos pas spu sdug lhag par mdzes pa'i kha dog
[\[82b.3\]]mdongs ni su yis bris/_/sgeg mo bzhin gyi dri ma dag pa'i gdong can me long ba lta la rab tu brtson pa shes par gyis/_/srin po'i gling las thar pa'i ded dpon dri za'i grong mthong de la gnas bcas don chen 'grub pa mtshar/_/drang srong chu yi zla ba blta zhing nyi zla'i phreng ba bgreng la brtsen pa
[\[82b.4\]]gtsang sbra lhag par che/_/rgyal pos dgra thabs kyis ni bkug ste bcings nas bsad pas srid dang bcas pa thob ste g.yon can min/_/ging pa srog gcod mkhas pa nyin bzhin srog gcod de la sdig pas mi gos gshin rje gshed/_/rdzi bo thabs mkhas lcags kyus stobs ldan glang
[\[82b.5\]]po'i kha lo ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsgyur pa phyi rol min/_/mig 'phrul mkhan pos nyi zla brkus te mun khung nang du sbas pas gza' skar thams cad dbang du 'dus/_/tshangs pa'i ril ba chus bkang mi 'dzag dag byed rgyud du 'chang ba shes na rten 'brel che ba yin/_/dpyid dus me tog mgul chad lhung
[\[82b.6\]]ba shing thog ro ldan 'gyur bar re ba'i mi de 'ja' tri yin/_/rdza so ma btang snod der chu blugs mi 'dzag min pas me nang bcug la ti tsha mkhas par bya/_/khu rta skom yang sa nang 'bab pa'i chu ni mi 'thung nam mkha'i char rgyun 'dzed par shes par bya/_/lkugs par sdod pa'i mi des khab len
[\[82b.7\]]rdo yis lcags phye bsdus pas rgya mtsho ra zla ba gza' yis bzung /_/dus mtha'i mdung rtser 'bab pa'i tshangs pa'i dngul chu de la gzugs mdzes brtan pa'i rgyal po lhag par dga'/_/zo chun 'khor los khron pa'i chu rnams gyen du drangs pas mchog gi lo tog smin pa e ma ho/_/zab mo
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]brda'i glu gsang ba'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//sha ba ri dbang phyug gis dam pa la gsungs/_dam pa'i zhal snga nas zha ma lo tsA bas gtan la phab ste dpal ding ri mkhan pa'i khrod du bsgyur ba'o/_/[{D2449}]@##/_/bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal nas/_
[\[83a.2\]]gang gis ma rtogs pa yis rtogs pa'i spyod pa mi bya ste/_/byas na rgyal po'i khrims la dmangs kyi gnod pa byas pa bzhin/_/rtogs pa rnams kyis ma rtogs pa yi spyod pa mi bya ste/_/byas na glang chen dag ni 'dam du bying ba 'dra/_/gsung ngo //_//slob dpon sa ra ha'i zhal nas/_
[\[83a.3\]]kye ho grogs dag lhan cig skyes pa ste/_/gzhan nas rnyed min zhal la dris/_/don dam gzhan gyi ngo bo de rtogs na/_/yid ni gar 'ching rlung yang chad pa med/_/gsung ngo //_//slob dpon tog tse pa'i zhal nas/_tha mal shes pa snying gi dbus su sad/_/tshogs drug dag na
[\[83a.4\]]bde chen rgyun mi 'chad/_/brtags pa thams cad don med g.yeng ba'i rgyu/_/sgom du med pas gnyug ma'i ngang la zhog_/gsung ngo //_//slob dpon sa man+ta badzra'i zhal nas/_phyag rgya chen po rang la lhun gyis grub pa ste/_/mi bsam mi rig 'bad pa med par ngang gis zhog_/chad pa
[\[83a.5\]]med de sngon du nyams myong rang gis rig_/rtag par mi 'gyur mngon zhen med par zung du 'jug_/gsung ngo //_//slob dpon ka na pa'i zhal nas/_shing rta'i 'khor lo gcig dang mi ldan 'gro bar mi nus bzhin/_/sbyin sogs 'bad pa byas kyang bla ma'i man ngag med na dngos
[\[83a.6\]]grub dam pa med/_/bya rgod rtsal rdzogs 'dab mar bcas pa dag ni mkha' la spyod cing rgyug_/skal bzang rnal 'byor dam pa rnams ni dbang dang byin brlabs dam pa'i 'og tu chud cing bde/_/gsung ngo //_//kam pa la'i zhal nas/_zab cing rgya che rgya mtsho nor bus gang ba la/_/klu yi
[\[83a.7\]]rgyal po rnams kyis mnga' mdzad ngo mtshar che/_/snang grags thams cad ye nas chos sku yin pa la/_/rtogs dang nyams myong ldan pas mnga' mdzod ngo mtshar che/_/gsung ngo //_//slob dpon lU yi pa'i zhal nas/_khyi rgod rab tu mi srun sna la sbrang rtsi byugs na phyogs
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]rnams kun tu za bar byed/_/blo dman skal ba dam pa'i gang zag rnams la dbang dang gdams ngag byin pas rang rgyud bsreg_/glang chen dpa' la brtan pa'i sna la ral gri bskur bas dgra dpung 'joms/_/skal bzang blo ldan skye med rtogs pa rnams kyis thugs phrad dag gi rnam rtog
[\[83b.2\]]'joms/_/gsung ngo //_//slob dpon ti lo pa'i zhal nas/_ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa/_/bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang /_/mkhas pa gang gis skye ba med rtogs na/_/dngos po'i rang bzhin bor nas bde ba che/_/gsung ngo //_//ti lo pa'i zhal nas/_bdag
[\[83b.3\]]nyid gdod ma nyid nas sangs rgyas yin pa la/_/ma rtogs dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid du ma mthong ngo /_/gnyis med gang gis rtogs pa de ni phyag rgya che/_/rtogs pa'i yul na mthong ba med cing rtogs pa med/_/gsung ngo //_//slob dpon shes rab bzang po'i zhal nas/_byis
[\[83b.4\]]pa chung ngu gsos nas gyad kyi stobs dang ldan pa bzhin/_/blo chung rnams kyang bla ma'i gdams ngag dag gis brid pas theg pa che/_/rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad rnams sman gyis sel ba ltar/_/nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i nad rnams bla ma'i gdams ngag dag gis skad

[\[83b.7\]]bral/_/de yang srin mo'i lag tu bu khyer 'dra/_/nyams su myong yang gnas lugs ma rtogs na/_/de yang glang chen lcags kyus phrogs pa 'dra/_/zhes gsungs ngo //_//slob dpon ba su d+ha ra'i zhal nas/_gang gis ma rtogs bar du ro 'di 'bras chan dag dang khyad par che/_/de

[\[84b.1\]]dpon rA ma pha la'i zhal nas/_sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa'i mchog_/rang gi rtogs par gnas pas na/_/gnyug ma'i sems kyis rtogs pa gang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong yin/_/gsung ngo //_//slob dpon ku ku ri ba'i zhal nas/_dbyer med sa la gnas na

[\[84b.5\]]myong nges don gdams pa'i don bral na/_/nor bu mching bu dag la bde chen min/_/chos de rnams dang ldan na re dog sa med par rang sar zhog_/gsung ngo //_//slob dpon lus med rdo rje'i zhal nas/_sems ma gdungs na bde ba che/_/zhe 'dod med na ro snyoms yin/_/'bad

[\[85b.1\]]skyes bu rkyal bas 'gro shes na/_/bram ze pha dang ma la bu skye 'gyur/_/gsung ngo //_//rnal 'byor ma b+harma'i zhal nas/_go cha chen po gon nas kyang /_/nor bu lta bu'i snying stobs kyis/_/rang gi sems la chu btang ste/_/mi ro'i khog par nges zhugs nas/_skye ba bdun pa'i sha

[\[85b.5\]]ngo //_//rnal 'byor ma kang ka ra'i zhal nas/_gnyis med shes pa chu la chu bzhag 'dra/_/rang bzhin ma bslad glang po lta bur zhog_/nyams myong spre'u gang ltar byung yang rung /_/rtogs pa'i nam mkha' ji ltar khyab par bya/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/dpal u rgyan du tshogs 'khor byas
[\[85b.6\]]pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa grub pa thob pa bzhi bcus rdo rje'i mgur bzhengs pa nyams kyi man ngag thig le gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//[ {D2450}]@##/_/na mo rat+na gu ru/_dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i ro zan mas dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams la tshogs

[\[86a.1\]]rgyas yin/_/dkar dmar yul gyi snang ba 'di/_/brda ru go na bla ma yin/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma ral ba'i thor cog can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho gnyis su med na 'ching grol med/_/ngos gzung med na sgrib pa med/_/rang bzhin med na

[\[86a.3\]]gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma nyi zla'i thod phreng can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho de nyid nyams su myong ba'i skyes bu gang /_/bde chen nam mkha'i khams su mi shong ngo /_/'di la mtshon du 'dug gam khyod kyis smros/_/nga yis ci yang mthong ba med par mthong /_/gsung ngo //_//mkha'
[\[86a.4\]]'gro ma lwa ba'i gos can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho pad+ma'i ge sar snying gi dbus su sad/_/gsal ba'i me tog 'dam gyi dri ma bral/_/dri dang kha dog ldan pa gang gis rkyen/_/'di la dgag dang bsgrub pa yod dam ci/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma me kha las rtogs pa brjod pa/_
[\[86a.5\]]kye ho nam mkha' las byung cho 'phrul ni/_/nam mkha' nyid kyis byas pa'i phyir/_/nam mkha'i dang du rang byung ste/_/'di la skyon du ma 'dzin cig_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma ro langs bde mas rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho bla ma'i drin gyis bde chen mchog rnyed nas/_/thabs gzhan
[\[86a.6\]]brtan pa rmongs pa shes par bya/_/'di las glud du gyur pa'i bde lam zhig_/gzhan nas rnyed pa sus kyang nus pa med/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma ye shes rdo rjes rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho sna tshogs snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di/_/dran pa'i gzugs brnyan yin shes shing /_/dran
[\[86a.7\]]pa rang ngos stong shes na/_/dbyings kyi bde ba btsal mi dgos/_/mkha' 'gro ma srid pa'i rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho rang rig rgyal po 'di mthong na/_/thams cad thams cad thar pa'i lam/_/rang rig nyid ni ma rtogs na/_/grol ba nam yang yod ma yin/_/gsung ngo //_//_
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]mkha' 'gro ma pad+ma zhabs kyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/_kye ho yod med tha dad bral ba la/_/gang gis brtag dpyad bya bar nus/_/dran med blo dang bral ba la/_/gang gis bsam zhing bsgom par nus/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye
[\[86b.2\]]ho stong nyid rig pa'i rtsal dang ldan/_/skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston/_/dgag sgrub med de rang sar grol/_/'di la bya rgyu ngas ma rnyed/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho yod do byas na ngos gzung med/_/med do byas na sna
[\[86b.3\]]tshogs 'char/_/yod med mkha' las 'das pa la/_/'di zhes nga yis mtshon mi nus/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma gzi brjid kyi rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa/_dran du med na ma yengs shig_/yengs pas 'khor ba rmi lam 'dra/_/rtogs na skyes bu gnyid sad 'dra/_/_
[\[86b.4\]]ngas ni 'khor ba ma mthong ngo /_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi bzang mos rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho snang srid 'di ni phyag rgya che/_/'dod yon 'di ni dngas pa yis/_/gnyug ma'i don la 'du 'bral med/_/bde chen thang la rgyug tu gsol/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma
[\[86b.5\]]dpal gyi 'od zer gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho gnyug mngon gyi gter mdzod na/_/dgos 'dod sems nyid nor bu yod/_/sde mig bla ma dam pas 'dzin/_/rjes su 'jug pa spro lags sam/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma bzang mos rtogs pa brjod pa/_ltos shig rang gi sems
[\[86b.6\]]la ltos/_/bltas pas ma rnyed rtsa ba stor/_/yal ga ji ltar dgyes dgyes mdzod/_/da ni rtog pa rang grol yin/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje bde mas rtogs pa brjod pa/_'gro rnams las kyis 'khrul gyur kyang /_/bde ba rang las gzhan med de/_/bskyar de rang gi don
[\[86b.7\]]de ltos/_/yid ni lam las thar bar 'gyur/_/gsung ngo //_//bdag nyid chen po nyi ma'i dbang phyug gis rtogs pa brjod pa/_nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid kyis/_/snang srid gsal zhing bsregs pa ltar/_/gnyis med ye shes chen po yis/_/chos rnams gsal zhing 'joms par

[\[87a.1\]]byed/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma lha dpal gyi ye shes kyis rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho nga ni mi skye mi 'jig ste/_/'gyur med ye shes rdo rje yin/_/nga las byung ba'i chos rnams kun/_/nga yi ngo bor mnyam du grol/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma stag
[\[87a.2\]]gi gdong pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho mi skye mi 'gag bsam las 'das/_/'di zhes mtshon pa'i tshig dang bral/_/ye grol chen po mchog gi lam/_/bsam du med do rang sar zhog_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma zhi ba bzang mos rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho sems kyi de
[\[87a.3\]]nyid smra ru med/_/gshis kyi de nyid bsam du med/_/chos kyi de nyid ngos gzung med/_/lam gyi de nyid bsgom du med/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma g+ha g+ha dpal gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho bu khyod ci sems de la ltos/_/spros dang bral ba mthong du med/_/bsam du med pa su
[\[87a.4\]]zhig bsgom/_/'di la ma rtsol gzhi la zhog_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma ye shes dbang phyug gis rtogs pa brjod pa/_gang gis de nyid ma mthong na/_/lus ngag dge ba'i las spyang kyang /_/bde chen mchog dang mi phrad de/_/gnas skabs tsam gyis bde bar zad/_/gsung
[\[87a.5\]]ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i rdo rjes rtogs pa brjod pa/_kye ho gang gis mthong dang thos pa dang /_/dran dang tshor ba'i bye brag kun/_/yid kyi ye shes dngas pa la/_/gzugs brnyan zam du shar ba las/_/gzhi lam grub ngo bos stong /_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma lha
[\[87a.6\]]nyi ma'i rta can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/_gang gis ma mthong de mthong na/_/yid ni rang grol chos kyi sku/_/rlung gi rta pho shul du lus/_/sems kyi mi pho mkha' la 'gro/_/gsung ngo //_//mkha' 'gro ma pad+ma'i myu gus rtogs pa brjod pa/_'gro ba yid kyi phreng bas bcings/_/yid

[\[88a.1\]]ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa lnga'i rtogs pa brjod pa mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod na gnas pa las/_dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang ba zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o//[ {D2451}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_DA ki

[\[88a.3\]]'byor pa ka ma la shI las rang gi de kho na nyid kyi ye shes gnyug ma'i don de rtogs shing khong du chud pa la gdeng thob cing /_nyams kyi rtsal phyogs med du shar ba'i stobs kyis gnyis med kyi ye shes chen po de mtshon pa tshig gi rta la bskyon te tshogs kyi gral du mgur bzhengs pa las/_ye

[\[91a.1\]]chu zla bzhin du snang la rang bzhin med pa mig gi rnam shes nyams su myong bas gzigs/_/'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i nad la sman pa rnams kyis drod tshad 'dzin/_/bshal rjes mi srung rtag tu bsrung ba ma lags sam/_/gnam lcags sa la bab na gang la babs

[\[91a.3\]]mkhan dang rtag tu 'grogs/_/zhing pa'i lo tog rten 'brel rab tu 'dzom pas 'bras bu ston rnams sdud/_/mchod sdong nyi zla nor bus rtog pa med bzhin 'gro ba'i don la brtson/_/so btang bum par chu bskyed mi 'chag snod kyi bya ba byed/_/ka la pid+ka'i sgra bzhin tshangs pa'i

[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]pa'i zhal snga nas/_dpal ldan yon tan kun gyi gzhi/_/'di med par ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/mos gus med par byin brlabs la/_/'jug pa'i yul med smin mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa karma ka ri'i zhal snga nas/_rang
[\[95b.2\]]gi don du chos kyi sku/_/gzhan gyi don du gzugs sku gnyis/_/bla ma'i dus thabs bsten las byung /_/'di med mchog gi dngos grub stor/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/nus pa la thugs rjes brgyan pa sa li pa'i zhal snga nas/_byams pa snying rje byang chub sems/_/'di med byang chub mchog
[\[95b.3\]]gi lam/_/nam du yang ni phrad mi 'gyur/_/grogs dag gces pa dor mi bya/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/bde ba'i gos kyis dros ta ra a ling gi zhal snga nas/_phan bde'i sa bon bskrun pa'i gzhi/_/byams pa'i sa gzhi snying rje chu/_/bdas pa'i ser la byang sems kyi/_/myu gu skye
[\[95b.4\]]'gyur gzhan du min/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/spros bral sgra 'gros la shar ba tsa ta la'i zhal snga nas/_rno la dar chags drag po'i mig_/gsal dngas phyar bas bying rmugs sel/_/rtog pa chod rjes chos nyid kyis/_/rang ngo rjes kyi shes pa zin/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/tshe 'di'i so
[\[95b.5\]]tshis zhig pa a nu se ra'i zhal snga nas/_res gsor rje ba dum bu'i 'gros/_/lta stangs 'jog 'dor rnam gnyis kyis/_/brjes pas nang phrad ngos gzung bral/_/des ni gnyug ma'i rang ngo mthong /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/dpa' gdeng lam du khyer ba b+hi ta'i zhal snga nas/_lhan cig
[\[95b.6\]]skyes pa seng ge'i gsang /_/smra bsam blo yi yul ma yin/_/ma skyes mi 'gag 'od gsal dang /_/rang rig spros bral phyag rgya che/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/zab mo'i chos la bzod pa ru pa ti'i zhal snga nas/_gnyug ma rang la gnas pa yi/_/ye shes khu ba 'thungs pa'i ros/_/_
[\[95b.7\]]myos pa gyad kyi spyod lam 'dzin/_/gdeng ldan 'khor ba'i g.ya' dang bral/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/mi'i khyu mchog te kho na ti pa'i zhal snga nas/_sna tshogs rkyen las shar ba yi/_/snang ba'i chos rnams stong pa las/_/ma 'das rang gi ngo bos dben/_/gnyis med de ni phyag rgya che/_/_
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]zhes gsung ngo /_/gtsang sme dor ba phag gi spyod pa can bi ga ma'i zhal snga nas/_dngos po sna tshogs sems nyid de/_/snang ba las ni gzhan 'gyur pa'i/_/phyi rol don ni yod ma yin/_/chu bo'i mthong snang de yis shes/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/bdag nyid chen po
[\[96a.2\]]a lu ki'i zhal snga nas/_gdol pa'i lag na mtshon thogs bzhin/_/tsan ta li yi rtog pa 'joms/_/bde gsal pheng gis gzung ba yis/_/dri med dngas ma sems la 'phel/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/pheng gi sgra sgrog sa ma b+hi tu ra'i zhal snga nas/_bung ba'i sgra skad pheng
[\[96a.3\]]gi dbyangs/_/dpal gyi be'u'i nang na sgrogs/_/'di yis gzung 'dzin rtog pa 'joms/_/sems pa'i 'od zer yid pham byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/lta stangs lam du khyer ba la bya de ba'i zhal snga nas/_srid gsum mi g.yo ye shes kyi/_/skye ba'i zhing ni bcing ba'i gdan/_/_
[\[96a.4\]]phra rags gcod pa ka ra Na/_/dpal gyi rdo rje'i mig las 'khrungs/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/go cha'i brtson 'grus can su ka ma la'i zhal snga nas/_g.yas su mnyam par bzhag nas ni/_/de yi thugs rjes g.yon du gzung /_/mdun du rnam par lta ba ni/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/_/zhes
[\[96a.5\]]gsung ngo /_/mi rtog pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa rat+na a ling gi zhal snga nas/_thabs kyis ma chun shes rab kyis/_/lam mi 'dod de shes rab kyis/_/ma zin thabs kyang de bzhin no/_/gnyis 'dzom mkha' lding gshog pa 'dra/_/zhes gsungs ngo /_/sbyangs pa'i las can ka d+ha pa'i zhal
[\[96a.6\]]snga nas/_thabs kyi gzhu la shes rab mda'/_/ma bral dad pas bskul ba yi/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags pas/_/dam pa gnyis ni thob par byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/'gyu ba stod la gnon pa ka ma la'i zhal snga nas/_rig pa sor bzhag rgyal sa 'dzin/_/dar med rlung
[\[96a.7\]]gis 'phro rgod 'dul/_/shes pa gzengs smad rma bya'i mig_/don gyi gnad rig der 'dzin pas/_/dam pa gnyis ni thob par byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/nga rgyal lam du slong ba mo kun ma si ta mo'i zhal snga nas/_mdun du zug pas rtsa ba zin/_/drug pa'i lta stangs rkyen mi g.yo/_/mthong
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]mthong rma byas gzhan snang 'gags/_/shes pa chig tshugs mi rtog lam/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/bsod nams kyi tshogs lam du khyer ba'i DA ki sa la'i zhal snga nas/_rdul med zhabs la bsnyen bkur ba'i/_/rnam par smin pa skar mda' bzhin/_/ma rig mun sel sprin bral lam/_/der
[\[96b.2\]]ni dpal gyi be'u mthong /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa b+ha ri d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/_mchog gi nor bu rin po che/_/yid la dran pa tsam gyis kyang /_/'khor pa'i rgyun chags rab bcom nas/_/bla med byang chub thob par byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/'khrul pa rkyen
[\[96b.3\]]thog tu grol ba b+ha do de ba'i zhal snga nas/_rtog pa thugs phrad yul mi dmigs/_/shes pa so mas 'khrul pa sel/_/rig pa yul rjes mi 'brang ba'i/_/chig chod ye shes skye ba'i rten/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/me long lta bu'i ye shes khong du chud pa mo so ri saM g+ha pa'i zhal snga nas/_dran
[\[96b.4\]]snang chig chod so ma'i rtsal/_/'khrul pa'i snang ba thugs phrad sel/_/dmigs med rten bral 'dzin pa'i rten/_/rig pa sor bzhag rgyal sa 'dzin/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/'dod pa'i blo log tan+d+ha ba'i zhal snga nas/_sgrub pa 'dod blo mi zhugs pa'i/_/dmigs med 'khor gsum dag
[\[96b.5\]]pa'i lam/_/'bras bu re ltos bdud kyi yul/_/mchog don spu ris med pas 'grub/_/ces gsung ngo /_/sgyu lus kyi rnal 'byor ma kun+d+ha li'i zhal snga nas/_'khrul 'khor las dang shing gi mi/_/bya ba rnams la 'dod pa med/_/de bzhin 'dod pa'i blo bral ba/_/'dzin med skyes
[\[96b.6\]]pa 'phags pa'i lam/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/nam mkha' lam du 'khyer ba ku ku ri pa'i zhal snga nas/_nam mkha'i bdud rtsi byung ba yis/_/grub mtha'i 'dod pa ji snyed tshem/_/ma bcos rnal ma'i steng du ni/_/rig pa mdung tshugs 'dzin rtog grol/_/zhes gsungs ngo /_/yongs su
[\[96b.7\]]mthar phyin pa'i brtson 'grus can badzra bi ma la'i zhal snga nas/_shes pa tha mal yul mi dmigs/_/gnyug ma'i ngo bo 'dzin rtog med/_/zhen med rang grol ngo bo gshis/_/rnal 'byor ma yi gzigs mo sa/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rnal 'byor pa su ka d+ha nu'i zhal snga nas/_'gron
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]bu'i spyan gyis dri med 'dzin/_/snang bag cung la bor ba yis/_/rang nyid nyams myong 'gyur med gsal/_/ngo bo mthong tshe rang snang grol/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/'od gsal rang ngo phrad pa d+harma b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas/_sems nyid 'od gsal dngos bo'i don/_/_
[\[97a.2\]]rang bzhin ngo bos sangs rgyas rgyu/_/dmigs med gdod nas dag pa yi/_/ye shes de mthong ma rig sel/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/du ma ro gcig gi rnal 'byor pa b+ha ta li'i zhal snga nas/_ngo bo spros bral dri ma med/_/'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas/_/shel gong 'dam gyis
[\[97a.3\]]gos pa bzhin/_/glo bur 'khrul pa'i rtog pas 'gribs/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/mnyam gzhag dngas pa ma ti pa'i zhal snga nas/_snying gi dbus su dran pa'i gling /_/pha wang mig gis rab tu 'dzin/_/yul snang mi dmigs phra rags 'gags/_/ma bcos rang lugs spros bral
[\[97a.4\]]lam/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/yon tan mngon par grub pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pa ma a re ta la'i zhal snga nas/_ka ra Na bcings lcags sgrog gis/_/srid pa gsum po g.yo mi 'gyur/_/rgyal po brtson du bzung ba yis/_/'bangs rnams 'phra bar mi nus so/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/_
[\[97a.5\]]yul snang sgyu mar ngos zin pa a b+hi ta'i zhal snga nas/_rus sbal mig gis rnam rtog bcad/_/de dus chos rnams nam mkha'i dang /_/rjes thob yul snang rang bzhin med/_/bden med mthong bas 'khrul pa grol/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/ting 'dzin zas kyis 'tsho ba'i rnal 'byor
[\[97a.6\]]ma tsaN+Da bi ma la'i zhal snga nas/_gyen gyi lta stangs tshangs pa'i gsang /_/dbang po rang snang phyag rgya che/_/chos nyid ngo bo thabs kyis zin/_/spros bral 'char ba yi ge'i gnad/_/ces gsung ngo /_/gzhan don la bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba sa ha la'i zhal snga nas/_pha dang ma ru
[\[97a.7\]]ma gyur pa'i/_/srid pa gsum na sems can med/_/bde med 'khor bar gnas pa la/_/snying rje mi skye smyon pa yin/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/bsgrub pa lhur 'dzin mo ru ru su ka'i zhal snga nas/_spros bral 'char ba gsang gi gnad/_/'phags lam gzhung ni byang chub sems/_/_
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]gzhan don lhur blangs rang don rdzogs/_/'di la dngos grub nye bar gnas/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rtsa rlung las su rung ba ni la pa'i zhal snga nas/_dran rtog 'od gsal la bcings pas/_/rang rig ye shes lnga yi mdangs/_/sa chu me rlung nam mkha' yi/_/snang ba rgyu lam 'bras bu'i
[\[97b.2\]]rtags/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan dz+nyA na d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/_dngas ma'i 'od zer du bar snang /_/smig rgyu ltar snang bde ba'i 'od/_/gsal ba srin bu me khyer 'ong /_/mi rtog 'od zer mkha' ltar snang /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/de kho na nyid rab tu snang dang rdo
[\[97b.3\]]rje'i mgur las gser gyi nyi ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag in+d+ra b+hu ti'i zhal snga nas/_'dod chags kyis ni bde ba 'dzin/_/zhe sdang gis ni gsal ba sbor/_/gti mug gis ni mi rtog 'babs/_/nga
[\[97b.4\]]rgyal phrag dog yon tan rgyu/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/lha'i rgyal po de ba ra mi'i zhal snga nas/_grong khyer rnams kyi mi gtsang lud/_/zhing la 'bru rnams skyed par byed/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud la ni/_/nyon mongs kyis ni ye shes 'phel/_/snang ba rang grol de ltos dang /_/zhes gsung
[\[97b.5\]]ngo /_/gsang spyod mthar phyin me go ba'i zhal snga nas/_mchog gi dngos grub sbas pa'i lam/_/ma gsangs bgegs chen skye bar 'gyur/_/gang 'dir mngon sum med pa'i gzugs/_/rtogs pa gong du 'phel bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/nyin mtshan med pa ce spyang gi spyod pa
[\[97b.6\]]can a nu shri'i zhal snga nas/_lha yi thig le ma bstan par/_/phyag rgya'i 'od zer phyir mi spro/_/rigs ngan gdol pa'i spyod lam gyis/_/bdud rtsi 'thungs na bcud du 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/na ba la rtog ba shar bkod ta ri tog tse pa'i zhal snga nas/_rtog pa spang bar mi bya'o/_/_
[\[97b.7\]]mi mthun lam du bslang ba yis/_/'gal ba'i rkyen rnams grogs su 'char/_/thabs 'dis gnyen po'i bya ba stor/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/e waM gi glu len pa de ba su kha'i zhal snga nas/_ji ltar nags la mched pa'i me/_/rlung gis rab tu sbor ba ltar/_/brtan pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/_
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]de tshe rkyen ngan grogs su 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/sems can don byed kyi bsam gtan dang ldan pa d+ha ra ni'i zhal snga nas/_yid kyi yul du gyur pa yi/_/blo snang ri mo su bas pa'i rjes/_/dran bas ma gos spu ris bral/_/dngas ma'i ye shes 'char ba'i sa/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/dus
[\[98a.2\]]skad cig mas 'das par rtogs pa shar badzA lan+d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/_mi rtog spros bral 'dus ma byas/_/rang bzhin med pas skye 'gag bral/_/gnyis snang grol ba'i de nyid ni/_/gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa'i dang /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/dga' ba'i mdangs ldan ma bi ka su ra'i zhal snga nas/_ma bcos shes
[\[98a.3\]]rab 'byung ba'i sa/_/gnyis snang rkyen dang bral ba'i dbus/_/mtshan ma rang sar grol ba de/_/dran brjed mtshams su ma bu phrad/_/ces gsung ngo /_/bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa rA hu la'i zhal snga nas/_dngos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/_/phug khrus tshe 'di'i mngon zhen bzlog_/bden 'dzin grol ba 'khrul lam
[\[98a.4\]]chad/_/des ni ye shes 'bar bar byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/phrag dog lam du slong ba mo dza ki ri'i zhal snga nas/_ngal ba don med tshe 'di'i ched/_/rtsol sgrub tshi chad sdug bsngal rgyu/_/don dam spyod lam ma spangs pa'i/_/'khrul pa bzlog par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/'ching ba las grol ba d+harma pa'i
[\[98a.5\]]zhal snga nas/_chos rnams ngo bo gzhi rtsa bral/_/gnyug ma rang ngo rtog pa yis/_/'dam gyis ma gos dngas pa'i dang /_/gnas lugs snang stong rkyen dang bral/_/ces gsung ngo /_/thos pa shes rab can dzo ki a ling gi zhal snga nas/_sna tshogs rang bzhin med pa'i gshis/_/der ni gzhi lam 'bras gsum mnyam/_/_
[\[98a.6\]]snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni/_/de ni snang ba rang gis bstan/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/thugs rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa gser gling pa'i zhal snga nas/_'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster ba yi/_/yid bzhin nor 'dra byang chub sems/_/sangs rgyas ma bcos lhun grub sku/_/'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas/_/zhes gsung
[\[98a.7\]]ngo /_/mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes khong du chud pa pad+ma bi ma la'i zhal snga nas/_rtogs pa'i bum pa bzang po nas/_/ched 'dzin rtsol ba ma byas pa'i/_/chos kyi sku dang gzugs sku gnyis/_/rang gzhan don du dang gis 'byung /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/dran pa so la 'jog pa d+ho ka ri pa'i zhal snga nas/_rkyen phyir mi 'brang tshangs pa'i spyan/_/_
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]dran pa sor gzhag der 'dzin bral/_/yengs pa'i shes pas yul mi 'dzin/_/ka ra Na bcings bde ba'i stan/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/'od gsal gyi rnal 'byor ma karma sid+d+hi'i zhal snga nas/_'jig rten gsum bdag gyen la blta/_/rdo rje gtsug tor spros bral dang /_/dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya che/_/_
[\[98b.2\]]dbang po rang snang der ltos dang /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rgyud rnam pa bzhi yis grol bas ga dza'i zhal snga nas/_thos pas grol ba tshig gi gnad/_/mthong bas chog pa dong yi gnad/_/'dra man ma zhugs seng ge'i gsang /_/ru tra'i sel med smin rjes grol/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/bsam
[\[98b.3\]]pa'i shes pa can sa li ta su ka'i zhal snga nas/_snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sgra/_/snying la zhen pa 'khrul pa 'jig_/sgyu ma'i mtshang rig bden 'dzin bral/_/gser la ra med 'dod dgur bsgyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/grub chen brgyad ldan me di ni'i zhal snga nas/_byas pa
[\[98b.4\]]don med sdug bsngal gyi/_/khur bor bde 'dod thar pa'i lam/_/sgrub pa nan tan dngos grub rgyu/_/yun du bsrings na mngon du 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/dag rnam par dben pa'i rnal 'byor ma a nu ki ri'i zhal snga nas/_/rtsol sgrub mi chad 'bras bu stor/_/chu la thug
[\[98b.5\]]srub thon mi bya/_/gser mtshon mthong ba'i sa la ni/_/ngal dung spangs na mngon du 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rtogs pa'i ye shes dbang nyams las shar ba g+ha d+ha pa'i zhal snga nas/_ma bcos zla ba tshes pa'i spyan/_/rnam pa'i lta stangs spros dang bral/_/'jam pa'i rlung
[\[98b.6\]]gzung gnyug ma'i dang /_/ye shes rgyud la 'char bar byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/bde chen zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor ma su ni d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/_zhun thar 'byongs pas 'phro rgod 'dul/_/des ni dngas gsal dri med 'dzin/_/phra rags mi mthong zla tshes mig_/yul snang ma
[\[98b.7\]]gzigs 'dzin rtog bral/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/bden pa gzigs pa a dzu ba'i zhal snga nas/_bla mas ngo sprad gnyug ma'i don/_/rgyud la 'jug pa byin rlabs mthu/_/rtogs na yon tan kun gyi gzhi/_/'di yis lam 'khor los bstung /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/bsgom pa'i
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]shes rab shrI a pa ka'i zhal snga nas/_khyud ni ma yi me drod kyis/_/shin tu sgo nga rgyas bar byed/_/dbugs kyang rgya las grol la khad/_/bya phrug nam 'phang gcod par 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rtog pa mkha' 'gro brda las byung ba kam+pa la'i zhal
[\[99a.2\]]snga nas/_ji ltar dra ba dbang po'i gzhu/_/mkha' la shar pa 'byung ba'i dngas/_/snang la rang bzhin med pa'i bdag_/'di yis chos rnams rang mtshan bstan/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/sems la dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor ma b+hi nu ka ri'i zhal snga nas/_sna tshogs snang ba dngos po'i
[\[99a.3\]]chos/_/rang gi ngo bo rnam par dben/_/ji ltar chu snang zla ba bzhin/_/khong du chud pas 'khrul pa 'jig_/ces gsungs ngo /_/lta stangs lam du khyer ba kun+d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/_rno dar chags pa khyab 'jug mig_/rkyen la gzigs pa gnyis snang 'joms/_/yul snang ma mthong
[\[99a.4\]]nam mkha'i dbyings/_/der 'dzin grol bas spros dang bral/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/snang ba sgyu mar 'byongs pa legs smin ka ra'i zhal snga nas/_ku ma'i ri yi rnam pa la/_/mi gnyis mtshungs par bsnol mar blta/_/steng dang 'og gi rnam pa ni/_/de dus gang yang mthong mi
[\[99a.5\]]'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/thos pas mtha' chod pa k+Sha na'i zhal snga nas/_nges pa'i don mthong sgro 'dogs chod/_/mos gus phyin ci ma log pa'i/_/blo la khams rnams dang gis 'du/_/gcig la yon tan kun mtha' yas/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rang gi skyon gcud
[\[99a.6\]]ba la mkhas pa mo su ka b+hi ru'i zhal snga nas/_thos dang sgom dang bsam pa'i mtha'/_/rig pa snyems dang bral bas 'bad/_/de yi rgyu ni yid ches te/_/rtsa ba mos gus mchog las byung /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rang gnas kyi ye shes ngos zin pa ku li pa'i zhal snga nas/_
[\[99a.7\]]sor bzhag dus gsum chig chod kyi/_/snang phyir mi 'brad dus gsum grol/_/rnal ma'i rang khang spros bral 'dzin/_/ma bcos pa ni chos kyi sku/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/ched du mi 'dzin smyon ma lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma dzanyA na b+hi nu'i zhal snga nas/_rma bya rgya ru chud pa bzhin/_/rig
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]pa so la bzhag pa yis/_/bde ba gsal ba sgrog tu 'jug_/rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rtogs pa'i ye shes dbang nyams la shar ba dza yin+ta'i zhal snga nas/_ma yengs rig pa dran pa'i rtsis/_/spyod 'gros bzhi la bzung ba yis/_/bden pa zad
[\[99b.2\]]pa don gyi gsang /_/mthong pas 'khrul pa yul la 'jig_/ces gsung ngo /_/ka ki dung 'bud ma a u da ra'i zhal snga nas/_mchog don dran pa la ma chags/_/yengs pa'i sems la de nyid stong /_/gang la rang bzhin med pa yi/_/mtshang brjed 'khrul pa'i dri ma 'go/_
[\[99b.3\]]zhes gsung ngo /_/rtog pa glegs bam bltas pa la shar ba rtsa ba ri'i zhal snga nas/_yi ge bzhi yis bka' rgyud khrol/_/thub pa'i spyod lam rnam gsum gyis/_/bde gshegs lung gi rgyud pa zin/_/gnad rig gsang ba'i gter mdzod brtol/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/sems
[\[99b.4\]]'jug par byed pa la mkhas pa mo ku la tsaN+Da'i zhal snga nas/_bdag med don mthong yul ngos der/_/chos rnams ma lus zad pa'i sa/_/rig byed 'dzin pa bram ze'i bu/_/gsang tshig pha yi gsung las rnyed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/phra rags bcad pa tsam pa ka'i zhal snga nas
[\[99b.5\]]rtsa dang rlung dang rig byed gsum/_/shes pa lung khyer spros bral gyis/_/steng du bcings pa gsang gi gnad/_/bshig rjes bde gsal mi rtog 'char/_/zhes gsungs ngo /_/snying rje'i mdangs ldan ma shrI sid+d+hi'i zhal snga nas/_bde dang stong ba gsal ba'i nyams/_/rtog
[\[99b.6\]]pa'i g.yo 'gul las grol ba/_/rig pa chig tshugs lam khyer gyis/_/lta stangs dor shul spros bral dang /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/'gro rnams gzigs ba ri ri'i zhal snga nas/_gnyis med gnyis su snang ba yi/_/blo de 'khrul pa'i snang ba de/_/'di yis srid pa'i nying
[\[99b.7\]]mtshams sbyor/_/snang ba rang grol de ltos dang /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor ma d+ha ri su kha'i zhal snga nas/_ma dag dri ma can gyi blo/_/nya phyis 'od kyi snang ba la/_/dngul 'dzin shes pa skyes pa'i tshe/_/nya phyis dngul gyis stong par byos//_zhes gsung ngo /_/_
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las ye shes kyi mdangs rnam par dngas pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//spu ris yid la mi byed gtum ma la'i zhal snga nas/_yul gyis ma bslad so ma'i rang /_/mdzod spu'i bar na dbang po
[\[100a.2\]]dngas/_/snang ba rang grol yi ge mig_/'di yis yid la byed pa 'jig_/ces gsung ngo /_/myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i thabs la mkhas pa me ti ta'i zhal snga nas/_yul gyi gsal cha ma 'gags la/_/shes pa der 'dzin bral ba can/_/rtog pa'i 'phen
[\[100a.3\]]las rnam grol ba/_/smin ma'i mtshams na rab tu gnas/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/snang ba dpe char shar ba me kha la'i zhal snga nas/_lam la gang 'phen rten 'brel 'gros/_/'di la gdam ngag yul gyis ston/_/tshogs drug dpe char shar ba yi/_/rtogs pa'i rkyen
[\[100a.4\]]bskul snang bas byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes thugs su chud pa mo b+hi ma la si ti'i zhal snga nas/_lam gyi grogs su 'gyur ba ni/_/gcig tu ngas pa ma yin te/_/rtog pa'i rten du gang gyur pa/_/de ni las kyi phyag rgya yin/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/_
[\[100a.5\]]dmigs med nyams su myong ba ka li pa'i zhal snga nas/_mnyam gzhag mi bskyar bshig rjes blta/_/dmigs bral shes pa 'dzin las grol/_/de tshe dus kyi rjes mi 'brang /_/rnam rtog chos nyid dang du grol/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/gti mug lam slongs pa mo b+ha la ta'i zhal
[\[100a.6\]]snga nas/_bying rgod bya ras ma slebs pa'i/_/gsal dngas phyed pa'i 'phro la bshig_/rjes srong ba ni bsgom gyi gnang /_/'di yis phra rags dri ma sel/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/brda la go ba longs pa ka na pa'i zhal snga nas/_rtsa ba rang dro brda yis rtogs/_/nges pa bla ma'i
[\[100a.7\]]gsung las skyes/_/don mthong bas ni sgro 'dogs chod/_/mkha' 'gro mthu yis bar chod sel/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rang gi tshig rgyun du byed pa'i smon lam la gnas pa mo mo ha ri su ka'i zhal snga nas/_yang dag don la yi ge med/_/smra bsam brjod pa'i yul las
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]'das/_/bla ma'i brda thabs che ba yis/_/rtags pa'i 'char sgo 'byed par 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rtog pa gru bzo la mkhas pa kan+ti pa'i zhal snga nas/_dmigs pa ma bcos blo rten zhig_/mtshan ma rang grol sgom dang bral/_/'dzin med spros bral rnam rtog nub/_/nyams
[\[100b.2\]]len grol bas grol ba thob/_/ces gsung ngo /_/sems rnam par dben pa'i rnal 'byor ma shI ma nu ra'i zhal snga nas/_blo rtogs ma zhugs tha mal gyi/_/shes pa de nyid gnyug ma yi/_/rang kha bcos bslad dang bral ba/_/bsam du med do sgom dang bral/_/zhes
[\[100b.3\]]gsung ngo /_/rang rig blo rten dang bral ba da'u ba ri'i zhal snga nas/_chos rnams gzhi yis stong pa'i sar/_/shes pa yul med blo rten shig_/dbyings der rtog pa'i rtsa ba bra/_/yid la mi byed rtsol las 'das/_/zhes gsungs ngo /_/gnyis med ye shes kyi rnal 'byor ma
[\[100b.4\]]kaM ka d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/_thog ma tha ma dbus mi dmigs/_/rig pa mkha' lding rten mi 'tshol/_/rtsa bral nam mkha'i rjes thob can/_/bsam med nyams myong dmigs dang bral/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/rnam rtog gzhi med du mthong ba u ti ba'i zhal snga nas/_chos
[\[100b.5\]]rnams gzhi med skye 'gag grol/_/rtog bral blo yis ma gos pa/_/dri med mtshan ma rang sar dngas/_/rig pa gcer bu de ltos dang /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/sems kyi don dang rjes su 'bral par byed pa'i ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin ma shrI si su ba'i zhal snga nas/_rig pa
[\[100b.6\]]bsgrims nas glod pa yi/_/dang der phra rags rtog pa yal/_/spu ris med pa dran med dbyings/_/dri med ye shes 'char ba'i sa/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/gnyug ma srangs su chung pa kam+ba la'i zhal snga nas/_yul gyi gsal cha ma 'gags pa'i/_/shes pa der 'dzin bral
[\[100b.7\]]ba'i gnas/_/rtog pa'i yal sa sna yi rtse/_/ma yengs srangs der ye shes 'chang /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/smon lam la gnas pa mo na ru ta'i shal snga nas/_ma skyes pa la 'chi ba med/_/chos rnams rang gi ngo bos dben/_/ma dran pa la brjed pa med/_/blo yis
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]mtha' grol yid byed bral/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/ngo sprad gnad la phog pa d+ha ka ri'i zhal snga nas/_yid la mi byed gnyug ma'i lam/_/spu ris ma dmigs rtog pa chad/_/blo rten dri ma snying la dag_/rnam rtog chos nyid ngang du grol/_/zhes gsung
