[\[101a.3\]]pa'i zhal snga nas/_rtog ba grol ba'i rjes thob ni/_/yid kyi spu ris ngos gzung bral/_/dmigs med dang der blo mtha' grol/_/gnyug ma ngos gzung med par sangs/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/'khrul pa'i sgrog grol ba mo su kha sid+d+hi'i zhal snga nas/_/tshogs drug yul du ma
[\[101a.4\]]spyad pa'i/_/dran med mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/_/rnam par mi rtog chos kyi dbyings/_/yid dang bral bas phyag rgya che/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/chags sdang grol ba sarba b+ha ga la'i zhal snga nas/_gzung 'dzin lam gyi sa bon gyi/_/de nyid skye ba med pa'i ngang /_/chos rnams
[\[101a.5\]]rtsa bral gzhi yis stong /_/gnyis snang grol bas 'khor 'das med/_/ces gsung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i smon lam la gnas pa mo badzra ha lu'i zhal snga nas/_rig pa bsgrims nas klod pa yis/_/dad der yid 'pham sems ngal sos/_/rtog
[\[101a.6\]]pa chos nyid ngang du grol/_/de yis ye shes lnga rdzogs byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/gdams pa lha la gsan pa kam+pa la'i zhal snga nas/_rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/ngo bo chos skur grol gyur kyang /_/skye bos mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rang gsal thabs kyis chod pa ni/_/_

[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]kyi sa bon bsregs pa su ka to'i zhal snga nas/_yengs na gnas pa'i bar du ni/_/rig pa so zin dran pa 'khyim/_/ngo bo 'dzin rtog las grol ba/_/blo yi snang ba gzhi rtsa bral/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/ha ha ha'i gad rgyangs can a ha ra'i zhal snga nas/_'khor ba spangs pa'i

[\[101b.4\]]ngo /_/bden 'dzin mi brten ma dbang na'i zhal snga nas/_yul snang dkar dmar sna tshogs la/_rkyen gyis snang ba'i dus nyid du/_/skye ba med dang bral ba yin/_/bden pa zad pa mig gis stong /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa d+ha ri su kha'i zhal snga nas/_dngos

[\[102a.1\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od dang ldan pa mo shrI pa ra na'i zhal snga nas/_skye med ngang la sna tshogs shar/_/shar ba de nyid skye med las/_/ma 'das chu dang 'khyag pa bzhin/_/dbyer med rtogs na phyag rgya che/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/snang ba'i rang mtshan gzigs pa la

[\[102b.1\]]goms pa'i rnal 'byor ma de ba sa ri'i zhal snga nas/_lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni/_/gang gi rgyud la skyes pa'i tshe/_/nyams su myong ba brjod mi nus/_/brda yis mtshon pa thabs kyi gnad/_/ces gsung ngo /_/ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin ma si ra nu sa'i zhal snga nas/_rig pa

[\[102b.3\]]rnams ngo bos dben pa yis/_/gshis de blo yi yul ma yin/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las gnyug ma rang gi ngo bo gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//'jig rten gyi bya ba btang zhing rgyal rigs dman pa'i sa bzung ba dA ri ka'i

[\[102b.7\]]yis stong /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/sgrol ma'i byin rlabs zhugs pa kam+pa la'i zhal snga nas/_dang po shes bya rnam rtog tu/_/ma shes 'khor ba stong mi 'gyur/_/ngo bo gzhi med rtsa ba bral/_/'di la rang bzhin yod ma yin/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/dad pa'i stobs ma su ka rat+na'i

[\[103a.1\]]zhal snga nas/_chu shing gi ni snying po bzhin/_/chos rnams snying po med pa can/_/bdag med rtogs pa don gyi mchog_/de mthong srid pa hru la por byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/brda la shes rab kyi mig phye ba ka na ye na pa'i zhal snga nas/_kye ma rang bzhin

[\[103a.3\]]'gag grol/_/rtog pas ma gos dri ma med/_/ces gsung ngo /_/rtog pa phyag rgya ma la shar ba a nan+ta'i zhal snga nas/_chos rnams rang bzhin dngos med la/_/don de byis pas mi shes pas/_/rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i bdag_/bla ma'i gsung las nges mthong 'gyur/_/_

[\[103a.7\]]ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/_/chos rnams stong par gsal bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/bde ba'i stobs dang ldan ma sing+ga sing nga'i zhal snga nas/_kye ma yongs su skyo ba'i yid/_/ma skyes bla med mchog gi lam/_/rnyed par gyur pa ma yin pas/_/'khor ba las ni yid dpyang bya/_/zhes
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]gsung ngo /_/khar sa pA Ni la bskor ba byas pas dbugs phyin pa na ri pa'i zhal snga nas/_bla ma'i brda las nges rnyed pas/_/des ni chos rnams stong par rig_/byis pas med pa'i chos la rtog_/des ni las las grol mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/'gro ba'i dug sel ma d+harma lang ge'i
[\[103b.2\]]zhal snga nas/_dngos po yi ni mtshang rig pas/_/dngos med yongs su shes par 'gyur/_/chos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin las/_/ma 'das bden par 'dzin pas 'khrul/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/'od gsal nang phrad pa tsan+ti ba'i zhal snga nas/_'od gsal 'gro 'ong med pa yi/_/_
[\[103b.3\]]bsam med sgom dang bral ba ni/_/gnyug ma srangs su chud pa las/_/'char 'gyur gzhan gyi spyod yul min/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/nor bu'i spyan ldan ma b+ha ra a ra li'i zhal snga nas/_sna rtser yid bcings gnad kyi gsang /_/ma yengs mi rtog skye ba'i sa/_/ka ra Na yis bde rlung
[\[103b.4\]]bzung /_/bde chen thig le gnas par byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/zag med bde ba la rgyal ba shrI k+Shu ti'i zhal snga nas/_bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/_/gser gyi rgyal ba'i mchod pa gus/_/bla ma'i ba spu khung gcig la/_/sku ma nyed song la khyad par 'phags/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/thugs
[\[103b.5\]]rje'i 'od zer can su ka d+ha na'i zhal snga nas/_bsod nams til dang ri rab khyad/_/su zhig thar pa'i grong mchog 'dod/_/bla ma gtsug tu bkur bar bya/_/'di brjed mchog gi dngos grub yal/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa'i a li pa'i zhal snga nas/_snang ba
[\[103b.6\]]gzugs kyi ngo bos stong /_/chos rnams sgyu mar blo thag bcad/_/bden 'dzin rgyud la brten mi bya/_/grub mtha'i lta ba 'dod pa spang /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/brtson 'grus kyi stobs ldan ma ri d+ha ru'i zhal snga nas/_gang la mngon par zhen pa yi/_/blo de thong cig bdud yin no/_/gnyis
[\[103b.7\]]snang shes pa grol gyur na/_/'khrul pa chos nyid dang du dngas/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/brda las don mthong bas 'khrul pa'i sgrog bcad pa su ta la li pa'i zhal snga nas/_nyon mongs gnyen por ma song ba'i/_/chos kyis sangs lam rnyed ma yin/_/kye ma rgyud dang ma 'brel pa'i/_/lta
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]bsgom ming yin ci phyir rung /_/zhes gsung ngo /_/bsod nams kyi rgyan ldan su ri ka ri'i zhal snga nas/_ma bcos rnal ma'i thig le ni/_/snying la brten nas 'khrul pa 'jig_/shes pa rkyen gyis mi bslad do/_/yul gyi rjes su 'brangs gyur na/_/khro bo'i
[\[104a.2\]]rig pa rten par byed/_/ces gsung ngo /_/dur khrod kyi keng rus mthong ba la rtog pa shar ba kum+pa ri pa'i zhal snga nas/_ji ltar lha dbang brgya byin gyi/_/ming de gang la 'ongs btsal kyang /_/phyogs rnams kun nas mi rnyed ltar/_/lus la bdag kyang de bzhin no/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/zab
[\[104a.3\]]mo dpal gyi 'od ldan ma'i zhal snga nas/_rmi lam du yang yod pa ru/_/ma mthong btsal bas ma rnyed pa/_/byang chub lam yin brtag par rigs/_/bdag med sgom dang rnal 'byor pa/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/sems la dbang thob pa kha d+ha ga ga ti pa'i zhal snga nas/_'od gsal
[\[104a.4\]]dngos med ngo bos stong /_/chos dbyings ye shes de ltos dang /_/stong nyid rig pa'i rang bzhin du/_/'dug pa nus pa'i rtsal yin te/_/me long lta bu'i ye shes so/_/zhes gsung ngo /_/thar pa'i lam ston ma dz+nyA na badzra'i zhal snga nas/_me long lta bu'i ye shes zung /_/rig

[\[123a.1\]]'gro la brtse ba'i blo can thugs rje yis/_/rgya mtsho mi g.yo dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/_/thugs rje'i mnga' bdag thugs kyi dkor mdzod nas/_/ye shes sgron ma byang chub lam mkhan mdzod/_/me tog 'bras ldan 'gyur med dpag bsam shing /_/'chi med

[\[199b.3\]]sbyin sreg las kyi de nyid shes/_/dam tshig sdom pa'i rgyud ldan na/_/mtshan mar bltas kyang grol bar 'gyur/_/zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang /_gzhan yang sku khros pa'i rgyud las/_las kyi sbyor ba rab shes shing /_/gsang sngags sbyor ba'i tshul bdun ldan/_spros
[\[199b.4\]]bcas spyod pa rab mkhas na/_/spros pa nyid kyis grol bar 'gyur/_/zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang /_gzhan yang gcig tu spros pa'i rgyud las/_mnyam ldan de nyid bcu shes na/_/dngos por zhen pas bgegs mi 'gyur/_/zhes 'byung ba dang /_gzhan yang dam tshig
[\[199b.5\]]rtogs pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud las/_sbyor la gnas pa cho ga'i mchog_/gsang sngags cho ga sbyor bas 'grub/_/ces 'byung ba dang /_de nyid bsdus pa chen po'i rgyud las/_gsang sngags spyod pas grol 'gyur te/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang ba'i mchog_/ces 'byung ba'i

[\[200a.1\]]bzhin yongs shes na/_/skye ba med par bstan pa yin/_/zhes bshad pa de yang bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dgag pa las kun rdzob bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis grub par gsal bar gsungs na/_gang dag khyed kyi gzhung la ni/_/brlag par
[\[200a.2\]]'gyur bar gsal bar gsungs te/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas ni chos can sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid 'dus byas yin te/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir sa bon las myu gu 'byung ba bzhin no zhes lta ba gtso bor mi 'dzin par dam tshig la sogs pa'i spyod pas 'grub po zhes slob
[\[200a.3\]]dpon kha cig 'dod do/_/de dag gi gzhung la brjod par bya ste/_re zhig phyogs snga ma ltar na don dam pa'i lta ba gtso che ste/_dam tshig la sogs pa'i spyod pa khyad du gsod pa'i tshul 'di rigs pa ma yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi rgyud sde mtha' dag dang theg pa

[\[200a.5\]]sgyu ma sbyor shes pas/_/lha yi sbyor ba de nyid kyis/_/bsgrub pas dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/_/las kyi dngos grub sbyor shes pas/_/zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang rdo rje pad+ma snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgyud las/_gsang ba'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas
[\[200a.6\]]gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i thabs rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i cho gas dngos grub bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur te/_gsang ba'i bdag po dper na skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang /_gtsub shing dang /_gtsub stan dang /_lag pa dang /_rtswa rnams 'dus pa las me 'byung ba bzhin

[\[200b.1\]]par dad pa'i rnal 'byor pas dur khrod dam chu 'gram du dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /_rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor bas grub pa dang /_sgrub pa chen po la gnas te zla ba drug tu rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa bcu gsum bsgrod par 'gyur

[\[200b.7\]]pa'i rgyud las kyang /_kun rdzob spros bcas yongs rdzogs shing /_/spros med mtshan ma med bltas na/_/tshe gcig dngos grub mchog tu 'byung /_/zhes 'byung ba dang /_gzhan yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa chen po las/_spros bcas spyod pa la gnas shing /_/spros

[\[201a.1\]]med mtshan ma med gnas te/_/rdo rje glu yis yongs bskul nas/_/lha mo'i tshogs dang mnyam du rol/_zhes 'byung ba dang /_thig le gcig pa'i rgyud las/_dpa' bos rnal 'byor yongs byas te/_/bsgrubs kyang dngos grub ma thob ste/_/mtshan

[\[204a.3\]]gzhan du sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ro/_/skye ba med par rtogs pa dang /_gzhan gyi don mthong ba dang /_bar chad du 'gro ba dang /_gnang ba thob pa dang /_na ba la sogs pa la nyes pa med do/_/gzhan dag ci'i phyir nyan thos bzhin du pham par bzhag//gzhan yang
[\[204a.4\]]gsang sngags thabs che bas bskang thabs la mkhas na pham par bzhag par mi rigs so zhe na/_'dir log sred can tshul bzhin du zhugs nas sbyor ba rdzogs kyang bshags pa'i tshul du mi byed pa dang /_phyi rol gyi chos la zhugs nas zab mo'i don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'o

[\[204a.6\]]ster/_/de las nyams na sdug bsngal 'thob/_/de phyir bskang ba'i cho ga ni/_/nyams pa'i tshad dang sbyar ba ste/_/bla ma las ni rgyur shes bya/_/ltung ba'i mtshan nyid shes pa ste/_/lus kyis ma spyad chung ba ste/_/zin dang ma zin 'bring du bshad/_/zin cing ma bshags

[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]par bya/_/de dag bskang ba'i rim pa 'di dag ste/_/lus las nyams pa chung ngu las/_/lus nyid sgyu ma'i tshul gnas bya/_/gnang ba thob pas khrag phyung la/_/mkhas pas maN+Dal mdun byas te/_/bla ma nyid la phul te bshags/_/'bring dang chen po'i tshul gyis ni/_/_

[\[218a.2\]]pa sbyangs nas mi bsten par 'dor ba dang /_gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis nas/_chu ser la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnams bsten par mi byed cing 'dor ba dang /_gzhan yang yan lag gi dam tshig mang du bshad pa rnams bsten par mi
[\[218a.3\]]byed pa dang /_rtog pa dang bral zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi don rtogs te/_blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i dam tshig la mi gnas pa'o/_/de dag las 'da' bar byed pa ni ltung ba'o/_/yan lag dus dngos gzhir gyur pa yang shes par bya'o/_/ldang ba ni bshad zin pa dang /_
[\[218a.4\]]'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyi dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba dang /_ldang ba yang de nyid las shes par bya'o/_/yul dang bsam pa dang dus dang rkyen gyi bye brag gis nyes pa dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/_/ltung ba bcu gsum pa'i bshad pa'o//_//_
[\[218a.5\]]da ni ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/_shes rab rang bzhin bud med la/_/smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_shes rab kyi rang bzhin ni sangs rgyas kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ste/_de yang gsang ba dang shes rab ye
[\[218a.6\]]shes kyi dbang gi dus su gzung ba dang /_rig pa'i brtul zhugs nye bar bsten pa la bya ste/_de dag kyang khyad par dang bye brag gi dbye ba yang shes par bya'o/_/yan lag dus dngos gzhir 'gyur ba dang /_yul dang bsam pa dang /_dus dang rkyen gyi bye brag gis nyes pa
[\[218a.7\]]dang lci yang dang nyes pa med pa la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o/_/ldang ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pas so/_/shan 'dra ba ni bud med thams cad de phyogs su bsdu ba'o/_/bshags pa'i tshad kyang yan lag gi nyes pa'i tshad do/_/ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i bshad

[\[218b.1\]]pa'o//_//de dag nye bar bsdus te bshad pa/_sngags pas de dag spangs na ni/_/dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/_/gzhan du dam tshig nyams pas na/_/nyams pas bdud kyis gzung bar 'gyur/_/de nas sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing /_/thur
[\[218b.2\]]du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro/_/de bsang rgyal bcom nas ni/_/bdag nyid dad ldan gus pa dang /_/ma 'khrul pas ni gzung bar bya/_/gal te nyams na bla ma la/_/phul la sogs pas dri ma 'dag_/bdag nyid gzhan la phan 'dogs pas/_/bla ma dkon mchog
[\[218b.3\]]mchod byas shing /_/gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te/_/bsod nams tshogs ni nyer bsags nas/_/byang chub sems la sogs pa yi/_/sdom pa thams cad gzung bar bya/_/zhes pa la sogs pas bshad de/_de dag kyang tshig gnyis kyis phan
[\[218b.4\]]yon bstan pa dang /_tshig bshad gcig gis dam tshig las nyams pa'i nyes dmigs bstan pa dang /_tshig bshad phyed kyis bdag nyid gus pa dang ldan pas ma 'khrul pas dam tshig gzung bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'o/_/tshig rkang gnyis kyis ni dri ma las ldang bar bstan to/_/_
[\[218b.5\]]tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis kyis ni bla ma dang dkon mchog mchod cing tshogs de nye bar gzung zhing /_dam tshig dang sdom pa gzung bar bstan to/_/'di dag ni bsdus pa'i don to/_/yan lag gi don yang thabs dang shes rab dang /_de kho na nyid bcu dang /_rgyu dang /_
[\[218b.6\]]'bras bu dang /_thabs kyi de kho na nyid do/_/tshul bdun dang /_bskyed rdzogs gnyis dang /_bsnyen sgrub kyi bye brag gis bdag dang /_gzhan gyi don bya bar 'dod pa ni sngags pa ste/_de lta bus dam tshig gi dri ma spangs pa ni snod du gyur pa ste/_mchog dang thun mong gi
[\[218b.7\]]dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/gzhan du dam tshig las nyams na ni tshe 'di la yang bdud kyis gzung ste sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur la/_phyi ma la yang rdo rje dmyal ba la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag la sogs pa'i tshad ni gong du bstan pas 'dir ma bstan

[\[219a.1\]]to/_/de bas na bdag nyid ma 'khrul par rtag tu dam tshig rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o/_/gal te nyams na yang bla ma la phul ba dang bshags pa'i tshad rnams kyis dri ma las ldang bar bya'o/_/bdag nyid la phan par 'dod pas/_/dkon mchog

[\[219a.4\]]tha mi dad la phyag 'tshal ba'i don to/_/rab tu bde ba 'phrog par byed/_/yan lag nyes pa bdag gis bshad/_/ces bya ba ni rab tu bde ba 'phrog par byed pa ni gzhi dam tshig las bde ba thams cad skyed pa'o/_/yan lag nyes pa nga yis bshad/_/ces pa ni yan lag

[\[219a.6\]]'dod nas/_dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i/_/rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang /_/zhes bya ba smos te/_dam tshig dang mi ldan pa ni dbang ma thob pa dang /_gsang mi thub pa dang /_sngags pa bdag nyid lam dad pa dang /_sku gsung thugs kyi rig ma'i lo grangs dang mtshan nyid dang
[\[219a.7\]]mi ldan pa'o/_/ldan yang chags pas nye bar bsten zhing mya ngan las 'das pa la mi dga' ba la sogs pas bsten par byed na yan lag gi nyes pa'o/_/dri ma las ldang ba ni tshogs la bshags pa ste/_dam tshig dang ldan pa la rjes su bslab pa'o/_/shan 'dra ba ni phyogs

[\[219b.1\]]su bsdu ba'o/_/yan lag gi nyes pa dang po bshad pa'o//_//gnyis pa bshad par 'dod nas/_tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa ni/_/yan lag nyes pa gnyis par bshad/_/ces pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /_dpa' bo'i ston mo dang /_tshogs kyi nang du

[\[219b.4\]]pas bdud rtsi thob byed pa/_/yan lag nyes pa gsum pa yin/_/zhes bya bas bshad do/_ma gsungs pa ni smod pa'o/_/de las bdud rtsi lnga 'thob par byed pa ni yan lag gi nyes pa'o/_/bshags pa tshad las 'das pa lci ba'o/_/nyes pa phra mo dang nyes pa
[\[219b.5\]]med pa yang shes par bya'o/_/ldang ba ni tshogs pa la bshags te/_dam tshig dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi bsten par bya'o/_/gsungs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/yan lag gi nyes pa gsum pa'i bshad pa'o//_//da ni yan lag gi nyes pa bzhi pa bshad par bya ste/_gsang
[\[219b.6\]]chos yan lag shes gyur yang /_/gzhan la mi ston shes rab ngan/_/yan lag nyes pa bzhi pa yin/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_'dod pa'i bsam pas gsang ba'i chos shes kyang gzhan la ston par mi byed na yan lag gi nyes pa spom po'o/_/bshags pa dus 'das pa ni lci
[\[219b.7\]]ba'o/_/nyes pa dang phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/_/ldang ba ni dam pa gcig la bshags te gcig la phan 'dogs pa la bya'o/_/yan lag gi nyes pa bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o//_//da ni yan lag gi nyes pa lnga pa bshad par 'dod nas/_dad pas sems can chos kyi

[\[220a.1\]]rgyu/_/gzhan gyi gtam byed byang chub sems/_/yan lag nyes pa lnga pa yin/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_dad pa dang ldan pa'i sems can chos kyi rgyu byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i gtam 'dri na chags pa'i dbang gis bre mo'i gtam la sbyor bar byed na yan

[\[220a.3\]]pa'o//_//da ni yan lag gi nyes pa drug pa bshad par 'dod nas/_/nyan thos nang du zhag bdun 'das/_/yan lag nyes pa drug pa yin/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_nyan thos ni gang zag la bdag med pa tsam rtogs shing /_lus ngag gi bslab pa la gnas nas rang gi don
[\[220a.4\]]gyi mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer zhing zab mo'i don gyis 'jigs pa ni nyan thos so/_/de'i nang du zhag bdun 'das te rang gi spyod pa mi byed na yan lag gi nyes pa sbom po'o/_/bshags pa dus 'das pa lci ba'o/_/nyes pa phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/_/dri ma las
[\[220a.5\]]ldang ba ni tshogs pa la bshags te rjes su bslab pa'o/_/yul dang bsam pa dang dus 'das dang phra mo dang nyes byas dang /_nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/_/yan lag gi nyes pa drug pa'i bshad pa'o//_//da ni yan lag gi nyes pa bdun pa bshad par 'dod nas/_rnal
[\[220a.6\]]'byor ye shes mi shes par/_/nga ni sngags pa yin zer ba/_/yan lag nyes pa bdun pa yin/_/zhes smos te/_rnal 'byor ye shes ni gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid mi shes pa ste/_sgra tsam la mngon par zhen pas ni sngags pa'o zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rlom sems pa ni yan
[\[220a.7\]]lag gi nyes pa sbom po'o/_/bshags pa dus 'das pa ni lci ba'o/_/nyes pa phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/_/ldang ba ni maN+Dal gcig tsam sngon du 'gro bas dam pa gcig gi mdun du bshags par bya ba dang /_phyis bsdam zhing yang dag pa'i don la 'jug par

[\[220b.1\]]bya'o/_/yan lag gi nyes pa bdun pa'i bshad pa'o//_//da ni yan lag gi nyes pa brgyad pa bshad par 'dod nas/_/snod min sems can thams cad la/_/phyi yi chos 'chad byed pa las/_/gsang ba'i chos rnams 'chad pa ni/_/yan lag nyes pa brgyad pa yin/_/zhes

[\[220b.3\]]dbang las nyes pa lci yang dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/_/dri ma las ldang ba ni tshogs pas ldang ba'o/_/'di dag thams cad shan 'dra ba ni phyogs su bsdu ba'o/_/khyad par gyi dgag pa med pa ni ltung ba bdun pa'i bshad pa las shes par bya'o/_/'di rnams yan lag nyes pa
[\[220b.4\]]ste/_/bskal ba mang por dmyal bar skye/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_yan lag gi nyes pa gcig lo gsum ma bshags par dus 'das na bskal ba mang por dmyal bar 'gro'o/_/de'i phyir 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ste mi nyams par bya zhing /_nyams na yang 'byor ba ci yod pas dri ma las
[\[220b.5\]]ldang bar bya'o/_/yan lag gi nyes pa brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o//_//rgyud gzhan las ltung ba'i mtshan nyid gzhan bshad pa yang brjod par bya ste/_rang lha blang dor ltung ba mig_/de nyid dus 'das ri bong can/_/lha gzhan dga' ba yon tan no/_/rig byed dngos la zhen pa
[\[220b.6\]]yin/_/ma rdzogs rdzogs byed mda' yin no/_/'jig rten chos phyir dbang po ste/_/khyad du gsod pa yang ni ri/_/gang min tshul ston bkra shis so/_/phrin las ma gtogs gza' zhes grags/_/don med gnas pa phyogs yin no/_/brtse ba gtong ba drag po ste/_/dman
[\[220b.7\]]pa'i spyod pa nyi ma'o/_/zang zing rtog pa yan lag go/_/yongs su mi 'dzin sa zhes bya/_/rang spyod dor ba tshes zhes bya/_/zhes pa smos te/_de dag kyang yan lag du dang ldan pas nyes par 'gyur ba yang gong du bstan pa las shes par bya'o/_/de dag kyang rim pa bzhin du bshad
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]par bya ste/_mig ni gnyis so/_/rang lha dor ba ni yi dam spong ba'o/_/de la ma gus pa la sogs pa gnyis su brtags te blang dor ni ltung ba'o/_/thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /_yang na rtog ge pa rnams kyis rang gi 'dod pa'i lha la dkyil 'khor gyi
[\[221a.2\]]bdag po la sogs pa gzhug pa snang ste/_gzhan yang mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi rgyud la dgongs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lus la bsdus nas byin gyis brlabs na khyad par du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bshad pas phyogs 'di lta bus kyang 'grub par
[\[221a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo 'pho ba la sogs pa yang tshul de nyid kyis shes par bya'o/_/dbang dang mi ldan pa la ldang ba'i dus na me tog bab pa dang /_bla ma'i rjes su mos pa dang /_thabs khyad par can thob pa dang /_las gzhan dang 'brel pa'i dus
[\[221a.4\]]rnams su nyes pa med do/_/thams cad du mnyam pa nyid rtogs na nyes pa med do/_/gzhan du nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/_/ri bong can ni zla ba ste gcig ces bya'o/_/de nyid dus 'das pa ni nyin dang mtshan mo 'das pa ste/_lha la lus dang ga dang yid kyis mchod pa dang yon tan
[\[221a.5\]]gzung ba la sogs ma byas pa'o/_/le lo dang brjed ngas pa la sogs pas lan gnyis kyis bskang ba'o/_/bla ma'i bya ba dang na ba la nyes pa med do/_/yon tan ni gsum mo/_/lha gzhan ni mu stegs kyi lha rten pa la sogs pa la mchod cing phyag byed pa'o/_/bla ma la sogs
[\[221a.6\]]pa mdun du byas nas gzhan 'dul ba dang /_srog la bab pa dang /_chad pa la sogs pa 'gal bar 'gyur na nyes pa med do/_/rig byed ni bzhi'o/_/dngos la zhen pa ni sgyu ma lta bur mi shes par dngos po ther zug tu dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bsgom pa'o/_/dmigs pa 'dzin pa dang
[\[221a.7\]]rtas par byed la la nyes pa med do/_/mda' ni lnga'o/_/ma rdzogs pa ni bdag smin par ma byas pa'o/_/rdzogs pa ni gzhan smin par byed pa'o/_/rang rdzogs nas gzhan rdzogs par byed pa la nyes pa med do/_/dbang po ni drug ste/_'jig rten chos ni tshe 'di tsam gyi don du zab mo

[\[221b.1\]]la zhugs te phyi ma la sogs pa gzhan gyi don du byang chub 'dor ba'o/_/gtsor byas pa las zhar la rgyas pa la nyes pa med do/_/ri ni bdun no/_/khyad du gsod pa ni bslab pa 'og ma dang nyes byas la sogs pa'i dam tshig mi srung ba'o/_/gong ma dang 'gal ba dang /_yar ldan pa dang /_na ba la

[\[221b.5\]]nus pa dang gzhan yod pa la nyes pa med do/_/nyi ma ni bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ste/_dman pa'i spyod pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig blangs nas gong ma la skrag nas nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod pa byed pa'o/_/gzhan 'dul ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba spang ba'i phyir dang /_dus shes
[\[221b.6\]]pas spang pa la nyes pa med do/_/yan lag ni yid de bcu gsum mo/_/zang zing rtog pa ni 'jig rten chos la chags na bka' dang 'gal bas gzhan gyi ngor 'jug pa'o/_/gdul ba'i thabs dang /_don chen por 'gyur na nyes pa med do/_/sa ni bcu bzhi pa'o/_/yongs su mi 'dzin
[\[221b.7\]]pa ni sdom pa zhig pa rnams so/_/de yal bar 'dor ba ni nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rang nyes pa khas len pa dang /_gzhan 'dul ba dang /_'du shes pa la nyes pa med pa'o/_/chos zhes bya ba ni bco lnga pa'o/_/rang spyod 'dor ba ni rang gi spyod pa mi byed pa'o/_/spyod pa de yang rnam
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]pa bzhi ste las dang po pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa bya bar gsungs te/_rgyud gzhan las kun du bzang po'i spyod pa gnas skabs gzhan du yang bstan te dgongs pa gzhan no/_/cung zad brtan pa thob nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa ste/_sngags spyod kyis zla ba

[\[222a.3\]]pa las 'das pa'o zhes bshad pa ste/_snod kyi rim pas rgyud sna tshogs la spyod pa'i tshul dpag tu med pa bstan te/_de'i phyir na de rnams kyi dgongs pa dang /_snod kyi rim pas rdo rje slob dpon gyis spyod pa'i tshul yang mtha' yas pa de dag gi rim pa dang sbyar te/_sman dang sman pa dang /_nad
[\[222a.4\]]pa dang nad kyi bye brag gi tshul gyis shes par bya'o zhes gsungs pas shes par bya'o/_/'dir rnal 'byor gyi lam rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya ste/_rnal 'byor la brten pa dang /_thabs kyi dam tshig la brten pa'o/_/kha cig dam tshig la brten nas rnal 'byor gyis grol ba yang yod/_
[\[222a.5\]]kha cig rnal 'byor la brten nas dam tshig gis grol ba yang yod/_kha cig 'di la dngos grub thob pa yang yod/_kha cig bar ma dor thob pa yang yod/_kha cig skyes nas thob pa yang yod/_kha cig ni lan grangs gzhan la thob pa yang yod de/_de dag kyang rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul du spyod
[\[222a.6\]]pa rnams so/_/de bas na las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa kha na ma tho ba dang bral bas gnas par bya ste/_de yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud cho gzhi ba mo pa rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa dang yang 'gal bar mi byed pa ste/_brtan pa ma thob pa nyams par 'gyur ba dang /_kha na ma tho
[\[222a.7\]]bas ma dad par 'gyur ba dang /_mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba sna tshogs su 'gyur bas sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya'o/_/thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pas sdom pa gsum ldan la gnas pas kyang rang rang gi cho ga las nyams pa ni las dang po pas kyang mi bya'o/_/gzhan du ni khyim
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]pa'i tshul gyis kyang sdom pa rang rang dang mthun pa la gnas par bya'o/_/dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa ni thams cad kyi nang na mchog ste/_de skad du yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus su khyim pa'i rdo rje slob dpon mkhas shing nus pa dang ldan yang dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa slob dpon du mchog go/_/_
[\[222b.2\]]de med kyang dge tshul gyis bya'o/_/de dag kyang med na khyim pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya'o zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir/_byang chub sems 'dzin gyur nas ni/_/lha gzhan la ni mi mos pas/_/dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang /_/de la gzhol zhing 'bad pa yis/_/_

[\[227a.2\]]rtog med gzhan don nor bu bzhin/_/sku gsum ye shes lnga la sogs/_/thub pa'i yon tan dpag bsam shing /_/ston dus skad cig gis rdzogs ltar/_/de phyir de la gsang ba 'dus/_/bzhi pa'i dbang gis rab tu brgyan/_/de nyid dpal mchog dang po ste/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mthar phyin lam/_
[\[227a.3\]]zhes bshad pa'i phyir 'di ni mthar phyin pa'i spyod pa ste/_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spyod pa chen po'o/_/dus shes pa'i spyod pa las 'gal bar spyod pa rnams kyi ni bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/bla ma'i bka' dang don chen po mthong ba dang /_gang zag la sogs pa'i dus shes pa dang /_srog gi bar chad du
[\[227a.4\]]'gyur ba la nyes pa med do/_/ltung ba de dag la nyes pa che 'bring gi rim pas dbang dang tshogs la bshags pa dang /_dkyil 'khor sngon du 'gro bas dam pa gcig la bshags pa'o/_/phyis bsdam par bya ba la bslab par bya'o/_/ltung ba bco lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o//_//da ni yan
[\[227a.5\]]lag gi nyes pa bshad par bya ste/_de'i phyir/_dam pa nyer bsten cig shos min/_/snod dang ldan pa rnam par brtag_/'dod phyir gzhan la gnod pa spang /_/dkon mchog la sogs nor la min/_/gzhan don skad cig yal mi dor/_/byang chub min par dge mi 'jug_/rnam shes 'pho ba de nyid
[\[227a.6\]]mkhas/_/gzhan du yan lag nyes pa'o/_/de nas sdug bsngal chen po 'thob/_/zhes bshad pa ste/_'di dag gi spyi'i mtshan nyid gong du bstan pa las shes par bya'o/_/dam pa nye bar bsten pa ni bla ma dam pa ste/_de yang sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/_slob dpon med par gyur na ni/_/dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur
[\[227a.7\]]bas/_/slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya/_/ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig_/brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/_/bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med/_/gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor shes pas/_/dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bya'o/_/de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing /_/sems can kun la mi 'jigs
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]sbyin/_/theg pa mchog la rtag dga' ba/_/de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs/_/zhes bshad pas dam pa ma yin pa bsten na yan lag gi nyes pa'o/_/cig shos min pa ni dam pa ma yin pa ste de nyid las/_phyi rol bstan bcos yongs shes shing /_/nyan thos rnams kyi lam bsgrod kyang /_/gsang ba de

[\[227b.3\]]gyis non pa ni mchog ma yin pa'o zhes bshad pas de bsten pa de ni yan lag gi nyes pa'o//_//snod dang ldan pa ni yang slob ma ste/_de nyid las/_dge ba sgom la dga' ba dang /_/rtag tu bla ma la gus dang /_/rgyun du lha rnams mchod byed pa/_/yon tan ldan pa slob ma yin/_/slob dpon ci 'drar lta zhe na/_/_
[\[227b.4\]]bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid rgyas par shes par bya'o/_/de bas na snod min bsten pa ni yan lag gi nyes pa'o/_/rin chen can ni smin par byas pa'o/_/'dod phyir gzhan la gnod pa spang /_/zhes bshad de/_'dod pa ni nyon mongs
[\[227b.5\]]pas kun nas bslang ba ste/_des mi bzad pa dang /_sha dang pags pa dang rus pa'i phyir yongs su smin par byas pas de dag spyad na yang yan lag gi nyes pa'o/_/min na ni ltung ba'i phyogs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/de ni dri ma las ldang ba yang de nyid kyi phyogs su bsdu'o/_/dkon mchog la sogs nor la min/_/_

[\[227b.7\]]par bya'o/_/tha na bdug spos kyang mnam par mi bya'o zhes bshad pas so/_/rim pas na smad pa'o/_/tha mal pa dus shes pas so/_/ser sna can la mthu la sogs pas phrogs te don dang bcas pas spyad par bya'o zhes bshad pas de'i phyir rim pa shes par bya'o/_/gzhan don skad cig yal

[\[228a.1\]]mi 'dor/_/zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad zin to/_/byang chub med par dge mi 'jug_/ces bshad pas ni/_smin par byas pas tha na lus ngag gi dge ba phra mo gcig kyang dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_tha mar yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/bsngo ba yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/_/_

[\[228a.5\]]'gyur te/_sbyin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang 'thob ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad de/_de yang sbyor ba sgyu ma lta bu la gnas la/_de'i dngos gzhi mi dmigs pas rnam par stong pa ste sgyu ma las kyang 'das pa'o/_/rjes la thob pa'i shes pas smon lam rgya chen po tshad
[\[228a.6\]]gzung du med par bsngo bar bya'o zhes bshad pas/_dad pa med pa la dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_de'i phyir gzhan du nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rnam shes 'pho ba ni rnal 'byor pa 'chi ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'chi ba'i tshe na bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis sgyu ma'i blo dang ldan pas chags sdang
[\[228a.7\]]la sogs pa med pas dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas la dri ma las ldang ba sngon du 'gro bas/_srog 'phrog pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsdus te/_rang gi ye shes dang mi gnyis par byas te/_'od zer gyis khams gsum dag par byas la dkyil 'khor la bltas te/_thabs dang shes

[\[228b.1\]]rab kyi dbus su rang gi yi ger bsdus la/_rang gi de nyid kyi thugs kar 'od zer dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o/_/gzhan du na nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/_/de dag kyang tshogs pa la bshags te bsdam par bya'o/_/gzhan yang lta ba dang spyod pa nges par gnas pa la the tshom skye ba dang /_theg pa gsum gyis

[\[231b.4\]]dang /_/gzhan sogs gzhung lugs mang po las/_/zhal dang 'dra ba'i bshad pa 'di/_/rgya cher 'grel pa'i dri ma med/_/lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i/_/bla ma brgyud dang lhan cig skyes/_/dad dang snying rje gtsor byas pas/_/sna tshogs rgyud dang slob dpon gyi/_/dgongs pa sna

[\[231b.6\]]rnam brgyan te/_/'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig_/rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba de la phan par byed pa'i yan lag dang bcas pa slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//myang ro stag tshal du dI paM ka ra bod du byon tsam
[\[231b.7\]]na bsgyur/_pu ri sha'i grong khyer du A tsAr+ya u pa d+ha shrI badzra shI la dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong brtson 'grus seng ges legs par mnos te gus par bsgyur ba'o//_//bal po'i khyim du du ma'i lo/_/rin chen grags pa bdag gis 'ongs/_/'grel dpe rnying pa la yang gtugs/_/shin tu yang ni dag par bgyis//_//_

[\[232a.1\]{D2489}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra satwa sA d+ha nA ma/_bod skad du/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thog mar bdag nyid stan bde ba la 'dug ste/_skyil mo krung gis gnas la/_sems can thams

[\[232a.3\]]gang ba/_de'i steng du hUM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po 'od zer kha dog lnga 'phro ba/_rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes pa/_phyag g.yas
[\[232a.4\]]pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin pa/_g.yon pas dril bu rked par 'dzin pa/_sku rol pas bzhugs pa/_zhabs g.yas pa cung zad brkyang ba'i mtheb chen gyis bdag gi tshangs bug la reg par bsams la/_de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du hUM la yi ge brgya pas bskor

[\[250a.1\]]khyim pa dge tshul dge slong ste/_/tha ma 'bring dang mchog yin no/_/sbyin bdag blo gros mi 'phel phyir/_/thun mong spang bya'i slob dpon ni/_/snying rje med cing khro ba dang /_/khengs shing chags la mi brtan pa/_/bslab pas ma bsdams 'dod pa che/_/rang la bstod

[\[250a.6\]]'khor lo'i cho ga nyams pa nyid/_/de rnams mgron gyi rnam gzhag go_/de nas lha yi nga rgyal gyis/_/gong du gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/maN+Dal sngon du 'gro ba yis/_/sngags kyis mchod la gsol ba gdab/_/rnal 'byor kun spyod la sogs pa'i/_/'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyis ni/_/nag po'i phyogs dang

[\[250b.1\]]phyogs la'ang /_lnga ste dus ni bcu ru 'gyur/_/de dag dus kyi khyad par ro/_/'dir ni rtag tu phun tshogs sam/_/ji ltar 'dod cing ji ltar nus/_/grub par nus na nyin re'am/_/lo zla kun du bya ba'o/_/gnas ni dben par gsang ba yi/_/'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya/_/phyag

[\[251a.1\]]ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/_/rnal 'byor tshogs kyi dbus dag tu/_/bzang po'i sgo ni phye nas su/_/dpa' bos gnang gis gtong du gsol/_/nang du stan la rgan rim gyis/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rim pa 'am/_/yang na gral gyi rim pa'o/_/de nas

[\[251b.1\]]sogs/_/'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_/tshogs kyi dkyil du dbul ba ni/_/yang dag sbyor ba'i rgyud las gsungs/_/'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs/_/ji ltar tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/bdud rtsi ri lu'i chu yis bsang /_/sngon du gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/phyag rgya chen

[\[252a.1\]]las blangs na/_/ltung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig lag nas lhung ba dag_/dngos po gzhan gyis dgab par bya/_/'dren pas ha cang gang ba min/_/len pas ha cang stong pa min/_/phan tshun gcig la gcig min bzhin/_/_

[\[253a.1\]]Na ro lA/_ta hiM ba la khAdz+dza i/_gA D+heM ma a NA pidz+dza a i/_ha le kwa ye kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i/_dun+du ra bAdz+dzi a i/_tsa u sa ma kats+tshu rI si h+la/_kap+pu ra lA i a i/_mA la a n+d+ha Na sA liny+dza/_ta hiM b+ha ru khA i a i/_phreM kha Na kha Ta ka ren+te/_shu d+d+ha a

[\[253b.1\]]gtor ma'i sbyor ba yis/_/dngos grub rnal 'byor chen por 'gyur/_/oM k+Shi uts+tshi N+De k+She tra pA lA ya swA hA/_/sngags 'di brjod cing kha phrus gdab/_/yang na slob dpon sngon 'gro bas/_/gang zhig ma mthong gyur pa na/_/rtags kyi sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_/rnal 'byor gyis

[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]su brjod/_/tshogs kyi dbang phyug de lta min/_/de bzhin dpa' mo rkyang pa la/_/dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ston mo nyid/_/de ltar 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la/_/shes rab thabs dang bcas pa nyid/_/gzhan yang gang zhig stobs dang ni/_/myos byed khu ba rkyang pas

[\[276b.1\]]bon len pas spang bar bsngags/_/skal ldan ma yi b+ha ga las/_/mkhas pas me tog blang byas nas/_/bzhos thog 'o mar bsres byas nas/_/bud med mo gsham rnams la ni/_/byin pas bu bzang skye bar 'gyur/_/gzhan gyis mi thub dkar
[\[276b.2\]]po'i rtsi/_/skud pa dkar pos dkri bar bya/_/bud med rked par bcing byas na/_/bde bar bu ni btsa' bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i bstan bcos rgyas pa las/_/bcing thabs bzhi po bshad par bya/_/pad+ma'i bcing thabs nyis log dang /_/brla bsdams dang ni
[\[276b.3\]]reg pa'o/_/b+ha ga la ni 'o byas nas/_/skye gnas lag pas rtse bar bya/_/'bad pas ling+ga bcug byas nas/_/dal bas brgyab pa brtsam par bya/_/rkang pa byin pas gnas byas nas/_/mgul nas rtag tu 'khyud par bya/_/sen mo yan
[\[276b.4\]]lag 'dri byas nas/_/myur ba'i brgyab pa brtsam par bya/_/'di ni pad+ma'i bcing thabs te/_/pad+ma can dang lhan cig brtsam/_/'di ni pad+ma can dgyes pas/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i yon tan te/_/rkang pa gcig gis mnan byas nas/_/rkang pa gcig
[\[276b.5\]]bcings khyad par du/_/'bad pas rtag tu chud byas na/_/'jam pa'i brgyab pa brtsam par bya/_/byin pa yis ni phye bas na/_/rang gi byin pa'i nang du 'jug_/de nas phrag par dgal bar bya/_/slar yang mgul nas gzung bar bya/_/rtags ni 'bad
[\[276b.6\]]pas 'jug byas nas/_/yang dang yang du brgyab par bya/_/rang gi yon tan 'byung 'gyur na/_/'o mas lan gsum bkru byas nas/_/de bzhin b+ha ga bkru bar bya/_/dung can ma yi nu ma bzung /_/snga ma'i 'dug stangs slar bcings nas/_/bsrub cing
[\[276b.7\]]sngags 'di brjod par bya/_/oM tsa la tsa la swA hA/_/stong bzlas pas ni dngos grub ste/_/yon tan bslab rnams skye bar 'gyur/_/de ni gnyid log 'dug stangs te/_/dung can ma dang lhan cig bshad/_/brla gnyis kyis ni brla bsdams te/_/nu ma
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]lag pas gzung bar bya/_/byin khung gru mos phye byas nas/_/'bad pas rtags ni 'jug par bya/_/de ni glang mo dag gis ni/_/rol byed ma yi byin pa phye/_/ma mchu tsum pa byas nas su/_/de yi 'og tu brgyab par bya/_/'di ni bsdams pa'i 'dug stangs
[\[277a.2\]]te/_/glang chen ma la sbyar byas nas/_/yon tan rgyun rnams ster bar 'gyur/_/yan lag phan tshun 'khyud byas nas/_/rol byed ma yi nu drag 'jib/_/rang gi brla steng gzhag byas nas/_/rtags ni 'bad pas 'jug par bya/_/sa la bsdad par byas nas ni/_/de
[\[277a.3\]]'og mgrin pa g.yas pas 'khyud/_/lag pa g.yon pa gtso bos gzung /_/yang dang yang du brgyab par bya/_/sna tshogs ma dang lhan cig tu/_/reg pa'i 'dug stangs tsog pur bshad/_/sna tshogs ma ni tsum pa nas/_/mgrin par 'khyud pas yon tan ster/_/de dang chang
[\[277a.4\]]ni btung bar bya/_/bcud kyis len kyang khyad par du/_/yang dang yang du ngal so zhing /_/so rtsi dag kyang bza' bar bya/_/tshig ni snyan par smra bar bya/_/'bad pas rigs kyi sgra ni brjod/_/dus shes pa yi mkhas pas ni/_/sna tshogs gos ni bgo bar bya/_/pad+ma'i dri can
[\[277a.5\]]pad+ma can/_/dung ma mar gyi dri yis brtag_/glang chen ma ni rdul dris so/_/'o ma'i dri yis sna tshogs brtag_/nu ma btsir bar bya ba dang /_/mkhas pas mang du tsum pa na/_/mgrin par 'khyud cing ma mchu myang /_/de ltar las rnams byas nas ni/_/de nas glu dang gar rnams kyis/_/_
[\[277a.6\]]rol byed ma rnams mgu bar bya/_/'dod chags khyad par sbyar ba yis/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal skye mi 'gyur/_/'dod ldan gang zag rnams kyis ni/_/ser sna zhe sdang spang bar bya/_/dul zhing ngo tsha shes pa dang /_/rol byed ma yi rtse zla rnams/_/'bad de kun du gsang bar bya/_/'jam
[\[277a.7\]]pas 'dul te drag pos min/_/slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i/_/'dod pa'i bstan bcos rgyas pa las/_/bsdus te gzugs bzang bdag gis ni/_/'gro la phan phyir snying por bsdus/_/'dod pa'i bstan bcos mdor bsdus pa slob dpon gzugs bzang gis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//_
